Content: Great app, helps me relax and sleep. Tons of features. Four stars instead of five because the lower ads block the bottom buttons. I can‚Äôt dismiss ad, and it‚Äôs blocking use of app. I don‚Äôt know what person ever clicks on these ads to begin with and how they even profit. So useless and annoying. WAY overpriced for ‚Äòlifetime‚Äô app. Even with discount I would never pay $20 for an app. Out of your minds. The best I‚Äôd pay is $6.99.
Title: Ads block functions

Content: This app is as simple or as complex as you want it to be. Works great for my wife and I, and our four month old. Sound quality is impressive as well, I downloaded 3 sound machine apps at the same time to try out, and I liked this one the best. My favorite part is that you can play your iTunes music over top of the sounds!
Title: Well designed

Content: I can‚Äôt sleep when it‚Äôs ‚Äúdead‚Äù quiet. One of the reasons is I suffer with mild tinnitus. The background sounds of this app help me sleep and ‚Äúmask‚Äù the ringing of the ears that I suffer with. The variety of sounds is great and you can mix & match different sounds for even more variety. Play it through a Bluetooth device or earbuds when you travel. I recommend this app.
Title: The way to relax

Content: It‚Äôs a great natural sound app for sleeping . I love that you can add as many sounds together that you like as well as control each sounds volume. The only problem that I had was that some of the blocks do not work for me. And it‚Äôs no the ‚Äúpro‚Äù version that I‚Äôm taking about the regular blocks the 1st half of them work and the 2nd half do not.  after that then the Pro selection starts.
Title: Some work some do not

Content: I‚Äôve been playing music all my life to help me relax and drift off to sleep.  This app will certainly help you with that. What I really like about this app is the number of ‚Äúsounds‚Äù you can use to construct your own ‚Äúrecipe‚Äù to lull you off sleep, the ability to save this recipe as a ‚Äúfavorite‚Äù and finally how easy this app is to use. To paraphrase, don‚Äôt go to sleep without it!
Title: Sleep Enhancer

Content: I'm still quite new to this app (I have the free version), but the experience of having a few of its soothing sounds running together for just a few minutes, then hitting pause and having only the usual nighttime house sounds in my ears, is amazing.  It's as if Relaxing Melodies' sounds had tapped into exactly the right wavelength in my brain to calm me.    I'll update this review as I have more information to share.
Title: So far, so good

Content: Just had my first baby, and this has been the best soothing sounds app I've found so far. A lot of apps force you to have the app open to hear the sounds, but I can use my phone, text, search etc, and the sounds are gently in the background for baby. They relax me too :) Also love the interface. Kudos to whoever came up with design. Love this app.
Title: My review.

Content: My toddler and I both enjoy the instrumental and nature sounds. We haven't really used the city sounds though. The sounds are on an undetectable loop, so I am not distracted by the sounds starting over. You can select any of the sounds to play together and even adjust the volume for each one individually. The only thing I would change is adding a little more variety to the free version. Enjoy!
Title: Soothing sounds

Content: At home I always sleep with an air purifier, so when I travel I find it hard to sleep. Some of the sounds are definitely better than others, but if you combine a few (my favorite are storm, windy trees, and oscillating fan) you can get a nice wide frequency white noise akin to an air purifier. Close enough that I am able to sleep well while traveling.
Title: It works!

Content: I know the app is partially for help sleeping, but I don't use it for that. I find it most useful when on crowded trains or at a coffee shop in public and I need good background noise to put on when I'm doing homework or reading. It gives a good list of sounds to choose for your mood. I highly recommend it for anyone that has trouble doing work in public.
Title: Relaxing

Content: This app is terrific! It's helped  to put my grandkids to bed as well as helped me get some really restful nights after a long day with the grandkids. There are so many different combinations, I was able to create an individual sound that works best for each of my grandkids as well as for myself. I highly recommend this app for every member of the family.
Title: A great app!!

Content: This app is amazing. I‚Äôve tried so many over the counter sleep aides. None come even close to the sleep that I have gotten using green noise the past few nights. It has been life changing. The commercials are spot on. It calms my racing mind down and what a change a good nights sleep makes! Thank you!
Title: Yea!

Content: Since beginning to use Better Sleep, I fall asleep faster every night. And I t‚Äôs helped me to get into a sleep schedule because I look forward to these meditations, relaxing sounds, and bedtime stories. I literally recommend this app to everyone I know who needs help falling asleep and/or relaxing.
Title: I love this app

Content: I‚Äôve had the app for a week and while I love the sound and music selection, I don‚Äôt understand why the app will suddenly stop playing randomly, get rid of the set up I had with the sounds I liked the next day, or stay playing for the set time I set it for. The app would be a definite 10/10 if these issues were fixed.
Title: So far so good. But‚Ä¶

Content: I don‚Äôt pay for all the extra sounds (even though I bet they‚Äôre worth it if you really want to), BUT I use this every day to fall asleep. Great quality and calming sounds that last through the night. I‚Äôve been using for over two years now‚Ä¶
Title: Perfect for everyday use

Content: My only complaint is that I wish the alarm were easier to get to and manage. Multiple alarms would also be greatly appreciated, rather than having to change a single one.  Other than that, I love all the sounds, the mixing element, and the organization of it.
Title: Fantastic app

Content: This app has helped me and my family sleep for YEARS. This app has many combinations so you can find the perfect one for you. Perfect for sleep, 10 star. Again- I remember when this app was called ‚ÄúRelax Melodies‚Äù. I‚Äôve had this app since I was‚Ä¶ probably 5 lol!! Would definitely recommend.
Title: Had this app since ‚Äúrelax Melodies‚Äù

Content: Thank you for providing the BetterSleep App! I love learning about my sleep cycles. I had no idea that I snore. It's a cute snore, but definitely a snore! üòÇüò¥ I was able to quickly fall asleep after a stressful day, which allowed me an appropriate amount of time to heal psychologically. I am looking forward to my next meditation. Thank you again. ‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: BetterSleep

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for awhile and I like the ability to mix and match the variety of sounds they have to create the mix that lulls me to sleep when I wake up in the middle of the night and can‚Äôt fall back to sleep on my own. It hasn‚Äôt failed me yet!
Title: Helps me fall asleep when I really need to.

Content: This app is visually stunning. With a large selection of sleep sounds and guided meditations, you can‚Äôt go wrong! My favorite features is being able to blend various sounds together and favorite for later use. This app delivers on all levels where others fall short.
Title: Best App for sleep & meditation!

Content: Even though it costüòí and I only got the things that are free, my first time listening to the bedtime music was soooooo relaxing and helped so much, it might cost but it‚Äôs legit and if you got the extra dollars for it or genuinely NEED it, then pay up! Cause other than headspace this is my go to when I‚Äôm having trouble with sleeping (which is Often) ... it‚Äôs just all around good!
Title: Perfect.

Content: I have tried lots of applications and white noise and lots and lots of things to slow my mind and help me get to sleep. This worked so well i am even waking up less often during the night. I am so excited. Cant wait to try new stories and relaxing sounds. Highly reccomended.
Title: Wow Really works

Content: It help me fall asleep faster made me have less stress and sleep for longer. I do a lot of sports and I‚Äôm used to getting up early to get to games so I used to wake up at 6:00 but know I wake up at 7:00 I know that it‚Äôs only a 1 hour difference but it‚Äôs still something. üòâ
Title: Better sleep actually helps

Content: Since using this app I‚Äôve begin to sleep through the night and get up thoroughly rested I‚Äôm the morning. No more laying in bed for hours waiting for sleep to arrive. Now I look forward to sleep knowing that I‚Äôll feel regenerated in the morning!
Title: Didn‚Äôt know that better sleep was possible for me.

Content: I haven‚Äôt been having good sleep due to finals so I was trying to find some white noise that can help me fall asleep and I came across BetterSleep, so far it‚Äôs been pretty good not just for sleeping but for mediating as well. Sometimes you just got to stop what you‚Äôre doing and have a few minutes to yourself.
Title: It‚Äôs pretty cool

Content: Better Sleep has a bit of a learning curve and it‚Äôs totally worth it. I enjoy the variety of sounds, the meditation aspect, all of it plus the ability to create my own mixes. This is a great app. They seem to have thought of everything and I definitely relax and sleep better when using it.
Title: BRILLIANT

Content: Since I‚Äôve started using this app, my two year old son has been falling asleep at bedtime very quickly and I love that I‚Äôm able to layer and mix multiple sounds to customize my ambient experience. I just wish I could have more noises unlocked without having to pay for them, like hey you used our app for 30 days here‚Äôs 3 new sounds.
Title: Wonderful

Content: I like that I can make my own combinations of sounds.  I‚Äôm very picky about what I like to fall asleep to and I‚Äôve only found apps that have premade sounds which don‚Äôt always help. So for me this is big because it‚Äôs been helping me sleep through the night.  I‚Äôm only giving 4 stars because I haven‚Äôt fully explored everything yet, but so far I like it.
Title: I like it‚Ä¶

Content: Had an issue involving playing certain tracks. Resolved within hours on a Sunday after sending email. Was given clear instructions on how to fix and received follow up message to check that it all worked out. Unexpectedly fabulous support.
Title: Great Customer Service

Content: This app helps my children and I sleep every night. We also benefit from it when we‚Äôre in a hotel or away on vacation. It helps drawn out noises of a hotel with the nature sounds. We have used this app for over 13 years. I highly recommend it for better sleep!
Title: Most calming sleep app

Content: I must have meditation sounds to unwind in order to fall sleep. Previously used the same app for years when I found this one in my search for something new to use each night. I‚Äôve gotten some of the deepest, most rejuvenating sleep I‚Äôve ever had!
Title: Can‚Äôt get to sleep without a meditation

Content: I‚Äôve had this app for many years and have purchased subscriptions in various forms over that time. I have usually had this app rated five stars, but now that you can‚Äôt just press white noise and play it even if you are a subscriber, it just seems like they‚Äôve defeated the purpose of having all these sounds. I just feel depressed White noise and go to sleep it shouldn‚Äôt be complicated.
Title: Why not make it easy?

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app almost every night for 3 years and I‚Äôm so glad I found it. I love that you can choose individual, unique sounds with ZERO ad interruptions‚Äîall for free. Honestly whoever made this app I hope you‚Äôre always happy. And they gave me a $25 gift certificate today. Like yes ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•
Title: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but YOU DESERVE IT

Content: I used to use this app at bedtime with a Shortcut to shut off my house lights and start the sounds with a single tap. At some point, one of the updates broke the Shortcuts functionality, and now the only Shortcut option that is available is ‚ÄúStart a Story.‚Äù I contacted the support team months ago, who told me that they would work on a fix for it, but it‚Äôs still not fixed. I‚Äôm having to use a different app now, and it‚Äôs not nearly as good as this app was when it was working properly.
Title: Shortcuts integration broken for months

Content: You have many options with this app, there is quality in all the things they do.  They are willing to change and adapt to new ideas, and they listen. Thank you folks for making my nights easier and more thought provoking..good-night.
Title: Worth the money

Content: I got this app just two months before covid struck where I was. They‚Äôve been very helpful during quarantine. They gave the people who don‚Äôt have premium access to other stores, meditations and sleep moves. If you‚Äôre considering getting this app please, take my word and get it. I‚Äôd give it 10 stars if I could.
Title: AMAZING

Content: I discovered this app not too long ago when trying to find a sound machine type app. I tried this one out and thought it was so cool!! There are so many options for sounds that you can combine, meditations, and music. It‚Äôs a completely customizable experience. Even with the free version of the app, there are lots of options!
Title: Such a cool app!

Content: I wake up about 3- 6 a night time and this app has changed my sleep, now I wake up about 2 times in one week get this app if you are like me. I like it because you can make your own music and the way you want it to be. There is sleep stories and they help me to fall asleep fast. Get this app soooooo worth it.
Title: Best app

Content: They have a great selection of free sounds, all super low beat and comforting. I‚Äôve used this app on and off for awhile now, and was pleasantly surprised to discover the selection of guided meditations. These guided lessons are adjustable in every way, you can change the background music, the voice and balance the two sounds to your taste.
Title: A very useful, convenient app

Content: I like using this for listening to noise to fall asleep to, for that it works great. However; I've also been trying to find an alarm clock that actually works. I've had an alarm shown but not turned on and to my surprise the alarm still went off. Next time I had an alarm set one night, next night I completely deleted the alarm thinking no alarm would sound. Surprise, the alarm from the previous night still went off, even though it had been deleted.
Title: Phantom Alarm

Content: struggling to pick between ‚ÄúCalm,‚Äù ‚ÄúBreethe,‚Äù ‚Äúheadspace,‚Äù etc etc??; then this is the RIGHT APP for you. pick this app!!! There‚Äôs way more free content, they‚Äôre not always bugging you about premium, and the sounds are really cool. basically: like imagine taking apps like calm and breethe, but you get to actually customize all the content. It‚Äôs awesome. This app is top tier bro, this is THE ONE
Title: BETTER THAN CALM, BREETHE, HEADSPACE

Content: It‚Äôs great! This app is so helpful! I couldn‚Äôt fall asleep one night, so I used it, and actually fell asleep. The mediation was great, too. I have just one concern. The stories and meditation have the SAME PERSON! And, same melody. Well, sometimes there are like only two different people who speak, or tell the story. AND THE SAME MELODY! There is the same melody, which the name of the melody is ‚Äòinfinity‚Äô. And in meditations, it‚Äôs the same thing. I still love the composer! :)
Title: Great! But....

Content: I‚Äôve been getting more sleep thanks to this app and have been way more relaxed and I would defiantly give this app five stars thank you for helping me with my sleep and I hope it will help others who have trouble getting hours of sleep at night!!
Title: My Sleep has gotten so much better!!

Content: I loved this app. I used it every night and couldn‚Äôt fall asleep without it. Over a year ago I paid $30 to have all the sounds unlocked forever. Last night I opened up the app and had access to only a few sounds and of course none of the mixes I saved. I don‚Äôt understand how this happened or why but all I know is that I can‚Äôt get it back and the price is now $60 a year... the app is good but not that good.
Title: I loved it till it turned on me

Content: This is my favorite app for white noise (or whatever). There are so many different sounds and combinations you can choose! Every other similar app that I've used, doesn't have the huge variety available here. The software is reliable and has been for the two years I've had it. Trust me- that's extraordinary!
Title: I like the flexibility

Content: We found the right mixture of sounds to put our baby (and ourselves) to sleep. You can choose specific sounds or use them in combination of each other. We downloaded this app after we realized another noise maker we bought shut off after 20 mins. 5 stars for sure on this one.
Title: Perfect for babies

Content: I didn‚Äôt think this would be as great as it is because some of the reviews are bad but this app is wonderful. I love how you can create your own combinations and even change the volume of the different sounds. Definitely would recommend for those that need help falling asleep or for those that, like me, need to drown out other noise.
Title: Awesome

Content: I was traveling on business and was having a very difficult time sleeping. I happened upon this app by mistake and loved that I could mix sounds that comforted me and put me to sleep. I also love this when I am flying. Put your ear phones on and drown out incessant talkers-boy is that annoying on an early morning flight or children crying. I highly recommend!
Title: I love this app!

Content: This is is very relaxing especially after a long day at school and lots of homework. Also helps with insomnia. I only have occasional insomnia and I had it the other night. Downloaded this at 2am and was asleep before 2:30. Note: I know the time because I set a timer and fell asleep before the timer ran out. I love it!
Title: definitely helps w/ insomnia

Content: A large library of sounds to chose from that made it easy and fun for me to find the perfect mix of ambient sounds for my  varying needs. It has worked for me not only for falling and staying asleep, but I found mixes to play to help me stay focused and relax when  I want to study.  Also great to use for those that practice yoga or meditation. Best app!
Title: Best App for to help me sleep or study

Content: I love the woman voice that walks you through meditation and relaxation exercises.  The built in sounds are so well done.  You can click on various sounds and play them all together to create a fusion of relaxing audio streams.    They also give you an equalizer to make the thunder and ocean more pronounced but make other sounds more in the background.
Title: So wonderful!

Content: Relax Melodies is amazing !! I play it every single night and it helps me fall asleep almost instantly. My mom has anxiety when flying and I played this app for her when taking off and landing and she loved it so much she also downloaded it. It‚Äôs perfect for anytime of the day and there‚Äôs so many different options for everyone‚Äôs preferences.
Title: I highly recommend it !!!

Content: Our fan broke and I was losing sleep without the constant noise from it. I stumbled upon this app and the sounds have worked even better than my old fan. To my surprise, I‚Äôm able to fall asleep quickly and stay asleep. Being able to mix different sounds together to create a custom sound is amazing.
Title: This App is a Dream.

Content: I bought a lifetime subscription to Relax Melodies years ago, and I never regretted it. I have used Relax Melodies every day for the past few years and my sleep has improved so much. The meditations in the app are wonderful and very useful. I couldn't be happier with Relax Melodies, and I tell everyone I know about it! If you are hesitant to get a subscription, go for it!
Title: My favorite app

Content: 10/10, everything about this app rocks. I personally don't feel like it's worth it to buy the extra stuff, but that just goes to show how awesome the free part is. I've had horrible insomnia for years, and now I sleep like a baby. I've recommended this to all my friends, and I'd recommend it to anyone else with sleeping problems.
Title: Perfect Insomnia Remedy

Content: Relax Melodies has a good variety of sounds without payments and it really does help me sleep more comfortably. As a man with insomnia issues this has given me a sense of comfort when sleeping. My current favorite sound is Medieval. I also love the customizability with the tracks. The only thing that could make it better is if you could sync up the tracks better to create better sounding melodies.
Title: I recommend

Content: If you can‚Äôt sleep without some sort of background noise, this app is perfect! Not only does it have different sounds you can mix together, it also lets you use other mixes people have made. It does have some sounds that can only be used with the paid version, but the free sounds are more than enough.
Title: Awesome app!

Content: Last week I was on an airplane and a child behind me was watching a movie without headphones. I could hear just enough of the squeaky animated voices for it to be distracting. I got out my headphones and was so gratified to discover that Relax Melodies works in airplane mode‚Äîno wifi necessary! I needed white noise rather than music to concentrate on what I was reading, and Relax Melodies delivered. Thank you!
Title: Not JUST for sleep!

Content: I live in a condo and can hear about everything. These natural sounds are amazing to help block those annoying noises out. Also, as soon as l turn them on, I'm out like a light . If I‚Äôm kind of over a sound I mix in another one them or try something new. Only gave four because I wish the whole app was free but I get they have to make money somehow. Download! You won‚Äôt regret it.
Title: Cannot sleep without it

Content: This app is great!!! I can use it without being connected to WiFi and it still works while on airplane mode! So many different sounds that you can choose from!!! There are some available to purchase that I think would be great to have but you wouldn‚Äôt have to purchase them to have a lot of sounds.   Great app!
Title: Amazing!

Content: We love this app! It is nice and loud and has a variety of sounds. It even lets you mix the sounds, which helped us match the ones on our kids' noise machines at home. This is great for traveling and hotels. I recommend traveling with a small speaker so your hotel room really is free from outside noise, though it is already pretty loud on my iPhone.
Title: Great for travel in hotels

Content: This app has helped me sleep since the first time I used it. The sounds are so authentic and relaxing. I love how you can layer the sounds you want and control the volume of each...it's like making your own personal sleep soundtrack. I love it!

I wish the volume could be separate for the alarm clock and this app. Otherwise, it‚Äôs fantastic!
Title: Love it!

Content: This app has been a staple in our lives since my son was born 3 and a half years ago.  No sound machine needed and we can easily take it on the road when we travel.  Helped ease my baby to sleep and he still loves his ‚Äúmusic‚Äù as he calls it. I love it too, helps me to relax and quiet my brain and drown out the sounds of an active house when I need a nap.
Title: Mom‚Äôs Life Saver

Content: I find it helpful to listen to guided meditations to help me relax and sleep well, but sometimes I don‚Äôt feel like listening to someone talk. Finding Relax Melodies was a terrific solution for those nights. I like being able to choose various sounds and vibrations and feel my body relax. I generally fall asleep quickly! Highly recommend.
Title: Nice alternative to guided meditations

Content: Love that you can customize different combinations, adjusting the volume of each individual input for the right balance. Other apps play for a few minutes then stop before repeating...the stop often wakes me up. This keeps going until I turn it off or the timer is up. Can‚Äôt sleep without it.
Title: Great for sensitive sleepers

Content: I appreciate the many sounds that allow true customization. Each sound has volume adjustment for further customization. The possibilities are endless. I also appreciate the meditations and the variety. I‚Äôm glad to have found this app and hope the developer continues their improvements. Thanks!
Title: Good for emotional wellbeing

Content: A delightful app that allows for plenty of customization to set up the needed atmosphere after a long day, during an otherwise mundane commute, or to have some interference for unwanted cubicle chatter at work. I like that it also plays while listening to my own music, as some the music loops (great as they are) do wear after a bit. Thanks so much.
Title: Let‚Äôs Zen

Content: I really enjoy the creativity that went into putting this app together. The combinations you can create are almost endless and the meditation feature is a bonus! I highly recommend this app to anyone who wants better sleep, but is also good for awake times when relaxation is what you‚Äôre after.
Title: Wonderful sounds

Content: I love this app so much. As much relaxation and meditation sites there are to choose from this one is different in a way the others aren‚Äôt. I am able to choose melodies with a good variety of Choices and it keeps the cost at a minimum which comes in very useful for me as I am on a limited income and want so many of offers that I simply cannot afford.
Title: Relax melodies app

Content: This app is tremendous and has far exceeded my expectations. It has many options so you can creatively tailor your sound experience. It has dramatically improved the quality of my sleep and has amazingly helped my dogs to remain asleep longer, which is what the five star review is really for! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
Title: What Strange Magic is This?!

Content: Relaxing, well thought out, and definitely something for everyone in here. Glad I found this app, it was very useful while traveling and now I‚Äôm hooked on it at home. And the interface is easy to use as well as beautiful. Nice touch
Title: Really enjoyable sounds...

Content: I have been having sleep insomnia for a while now and have been trying lots of different methods to fix it. So I decided to try this app, it is really good for picking what sounds you want and how loud you want each sound to be. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs the sounds that make me fall asleep or if I was just really tired but I have been noticing  that I am falling asleep faster than I was without the sounds.
Title: Kinda Works

Content: Helps me fall asleep fast and it has a timer along with so many different settings that prevent your phone from losing too much battery! You can personalize your app to fit your personality and needs! I didn‚Äôt think it would work but I was desperate one night and I haven‚Äôt been able to stop using it since!!!!!!!! üíõüíöüíôüíú‚ô•Ô∏èüß° #SweetDreams #InLove #BestApp
Title: Best sleep ever!

Content: This app has a great variety of sounds and melodies that can be played solo or combined for a soothing mix. I work night shift and so trying to sleep during the day with all the noises of day time that you don‚Äôt really consider like neighbors doing construction, people in an out of my home etc. this app has been a lifesaver. It‚Äôs been a great way to drown out the outside noises and relax.
Title: Love it!

Content: Truly I do. I‚Äôve been trying to use white noise/sounds to help me fall asleep as I‚Äôve been relying on tv/videos to help me sleep for the past few years, which has put strain on my eyes and kills my phone half way through the night. This is an amazing alternative, all the sounds are beautiful and I love mixing and matching them.
Title: I sleep so much better now

Content: I really like this app. I use it more often than I thought when sleeping away from home or doing work in a crowded area (earbuds and this app really drown out background chatter). Doesn't eat up battery life or make your phone hot. I have an iPhone and the app stops when the alarm sounds in the morning too. It‚Äôs also really nice to just have in the background when I‚Äôm cooking or studying. Easy.
Title: Great, easy app

Content: This app is good as far as free apps go. I like that it does have somewhat a wide variety of sounds. I also like that I can custom make my own sleep aid sounds. You can mix up to three sounds. I wish I would have done more world rhythm sounds.  I've had it on two phones & now an iPad. I am slightly interested in paying for the app, but love the free sounds very well!
Title: Good Free App

Content: This has been a fabulous app for both personal meditation AND for helping little ones to fall asleep. I highly recommend this app. It has been quite soothing in our lives.  I love that I don't need wifi to play the sounds. It was proved a huge help when needing to meditate in the woods and to calm our baby on a nighttime drive. I use this  every single day.
Title: Meditation

Content: I currently live with three other people, two cats, and a puppy. This app is perfect for those loud nights when you're just trying to get some sleep before work the next day. Even for the free version, there are plenty of melodies to choose from. Also great for focusing at work when your cubicle isn't as quiet as you'd like. :)
Title: Perfect for Light-Sleep with Roommates

Content: I was having a hard time winding down after my shifts at work. This was the key to helping me relax before bed. Working in a high stress environment kept me up at night. This was so helpful in finding my inner relaxation so I could drift off to sleep. The variety of sounds and the pure customization drew me to this app. A must have for anyone trying to de-stress after work.
Title: Relaxing soundscape

Content: I use this app quite often and have had it for quite a while.  The in-app purchase was definitely worth it. ;) I'm not crazy about the guided meditations. I do love to meditate, but these aren't my favorite. I do, however, listen to all kinds of combinations of the sounds available in this app while meditating. I like the binaural beats, as well. Overall, very good app.
Title: Good stuff

Content: I was skeptical about an app that could help me sleep. Ive never been the type to listen to the sounds of the ocean and fall asleep, but this app really helps by guiding me through clearing my mind before bed. I often times have a hard time falling asleep and with this, I find that it work and actually puts me at ease. Highly recommend!
Title: Surprisingly helpful!

Content: This app is easy to use and convenient because it can close out of the app after a set time so it does not waist battery. I love how many sounds you can choose from and how you can easily mix and play them to your choosing. The sounds are good quality and easily help me fall asleep when used as background noises.

Content: I love the versatility of this app. You can layer sounds and even adjust the strength of each one in the mix. There is a sleep fade out feature I use all the time and you can even set how long the sound mix takes to fade off. Best download ever! Highly recommend for long flights, a sound machine replacement for sleeping or just unwinding.
Title: Very customizable!

Content: i adore this app sm!!! i saw an ad for it somewhere on yt and i was like‚Ä¶ hmmmm??? it‚Äôs honestly rlly relaxing and instead of using white noise to sleep, i can use nice ocean waves and more! thanks so much !!! üíó not only that, but since my sleeping schedule is wonky‚Ä¶ üòìüòì this app sends cute reminders for me to sleep at my suggested time! thanks so much for that <3 such a cute feature fr ALSO‚Ä¶ they have nice music & exercises to help you sleep honestly, i‚Äôm obsessed!! i love reading so i‚Äôm sure that in the future i‚Äôll listen to this while reading. now, it‚Äôs time to go snooze to my new playlist i made!! zz zzzz zzz 5 stars! PLEASE purchase this app since it‚Äôs worth it ^ ^
Title: amazing !!

Content: I love this app I started using it 3years ago one night when I couldn‚Äôt fall asleep and I can‚Äôt fall asleep with out it anymore! recommend to so many of my family and friends that were having trouble sleeping and they all really loved it. Definitely recommend getting this app

It works when you airplay from the control deck on the phone but doesn‚Äôt give the option from inside the BetterSleep app or the Home app.

(One thing I‚Äôd love is customize your own sounds, for example playing the piano as the app records so it can turn what you play into a looping sound that can be saved and overlapped with the other looping sounds)

Or they would show up only days later and then disappear again. And often the dates didn‚Äôt show up either. The reason I got this app was for these features, not so much for the sounds/music or bedtime stories (which are the things that are still working for me).

Title: It honestly helped personally

Content: After using this app for 8  years, this past weekend there was a bug that crashed the app. The company was VERY quick to push an update that resolved this. I also received a quick response to my email I sent to support. A  on customer service.
Title: Fixed

Content: I‚Äôm only a couple days in, but the sound mix I have is super relaxing and calming. My only real issue so far is that I‚Äôd like to be able to sample the locked sounds to decide if I want to get a subscription. If I like them, I think it would be worth it, but not being able to hear at least a short clip has me hesitating a bit.
Title: Liking it so far

Content: This app is an absolute life saver if you have trouble falling asleep and wake up at the smallest, quietest noises. There are crazy customization options, and I legitimately love playing with the different sound combinations you can use!! :)

Content: I absolutely love this app. I‚Äôve been using it for YEARS. I sleep so well with their guided meditations and stories. The sounds on the app are very helpful too! Title: Can‚Äôt sleep without it!ü•±

Content: Unlike other apps of its kind, Better Sleep no longer allows playback while listening to audio from other apps. The "alarm" workaround that Support suggests is buggy and does not work reliably. Frankly, there is no excuse for programming so poor that such a workaround is required for a standard and simple feature. You can find many free apps that do not leave out basic playback functions. The majority of them have less predatory subscription pushes than Better Sleep, as well.

Content: I have anxiety and this app helped me though my anxiety and now I‚Äôm more active and I have a lot friends because my anxiety is gone oh and it helps me sleep too. so this app in my opinion it gets a 9/10 and why it‚Äôs a nine is because you have to pay for a certain thing but some are free. so yeah hope you enjoy this app bye y‚Äôall.

I love you guys please do take out the filters I would love if you do if you do it thank you and it does not need to be updated. ‚ô•Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è If you don‚Äôt know what I am talking about then tell me I can‚Äôt see your response but in my notifications it tells me.
Title: Please Read Developers

Content: This is the best app I‚Äôve ever downloaded I‚Äôve had problems with sleeping in the past this app has really helped me the only thing I would change is that I think there should be more bedtime stories and meditations for people who don‚Äôt have the membership but otherwise five stars!!üò¥üò¥
Title: Seriously best app everüòÑüòÑüòÑ

Title: Definitely worth a try

Content: Every night I tremble with great existential dread. It has been this way for years and years, beyond me into the roots of my family tree that are strange and unfamiliar to us civilized folk. Title: My oh my

Content: This app has something for everyone to help shut off the outside world and focus on slowing down, whether it be through a guided mediation, or soothing sounds to help you sleep, to affirmations‚Äîthere is something for everyone and you don‚Äôt need to pay to access a lot of the options available!
Title: A relaxing and peaceful way to drift off into lala land

Content: I cannot believe this wonderful app is now charging me a yearly subscription to use every sound, even those that were previously free. I saw in other reviews that we are being recommended to email support if we are having this problem‚Äî I will not do this, because it is clear from the numerous reviews that this a widespread issue that has to be fixed by developers, not an individual error. I even uninstalled then reinstalled the app, and the problem persists. If this bug doesn‚Äôt get fixed soon, I will have to delete it. A real shame.
Title: A once loyal user

Content: I‚Äôm really sad that this app costs money now. I have been using it since 2014 and it has helped my sleep a lot. I‚Äôm not even considering paying for it since the company has a shady tactic of gaining thousands of good reviews from a FREE app and use it to their advantage to convince others that it‚Äôs amazing and they should buy it. Also, the company should at least own up to their lack of any free sounds because their generic reply‚Äôs to others insist that there‚Äôs a technical error which is not true so definitely would not give them my money; deleted and will never buy.
Title: DO NOT UPDATE

Content: I enjoy using the sounds for falling asleep when I‚Äôm away from home.  But lately I use it even more on airplanes to drown out loud talkers, fussy babies, or other noises that distract me from my work or reading.    I like being able to create a custom mix and the timer is also great.   Thanks for a relaxing app experience!

I usually have a music app (apple music, soundcloud, pandora, spotify,...etc) + this app + a game app (sound on) running at the same time. Very useful when you wanna add in some more flavors to your ears.
Title: Highly Recommended!

Content: I‚Äôm not a light sleeper sonI don‚Äôt really need it when I sleep. But I need it to help me focus on studying when I‚Äôm in a crowded, loud place like cafe.  UNLIKE those others app which make us pay to avoid ads and have the full ability. Though I don‚Äôt buy the Pro version, the free version still has so many useful functions!

Content: I love this app. And it‚Äôs totally with it to get the premium version. Content: The ability to choose your own personal ‚ÄúHappy Place‚Äù is my favorite feature of this app. If I want to remember my Hawaiian vacation, I can choose the surf, strings, birds, close my eyes and be there.  Same for my NYC weekend: traffic, rain, etc.... Adjusting the level of each layer of sound provides unlimited options. Love, Love, Love it.
Title: ‚ÄòRelax‚Äô is different for different people!

Content: Love this app! I have a sound box at home next to the bed that always has the ocean or rain playing when I'm sleeping. Title: Good to go!

Content: Hi!  To tell the truth, I stopped using Relax Melodies for a time in the last few months.  Its sounds sounded a little artificial.  In a quest for better sleep, I opened it and decided to use it a few nights ago.  I remembered the calmest sleep I‚Äôve ever had, my vacation in London.  I turned on Urban Rainstorm and it certainly sounded like a heavy rain falling outside my window in the city.  I slept through the night so comforted!  I‚Äôm a frequent user now!  God bless you!
Title: Bethany

Content: It‚Äôs a variety of sound here for everyone, if your from the city and used to hearing it there is something for that if you just a small town person living in the city and you want something to remind you of home here it is!!! This app has awesome variety. I‚Äôve only given it four stars based on the fact that I haven‚Äôt purchased pro as yet to see what it offers.
Title: True to it‚Äôs name

Content: As a person who works in nightlife, as well as a day job, I have crazy irregular hours, so it's hard to actually wind down and get to sleep when I can. But this app has made getting to sleep and staying asleep a breeze üòå Definitely recommend to anyone that struggles with balancing sleep/work/having some type of social life

Content: I‚Äôm a person who can‚Äôt sleep at all without sound, I need a certain amount of sound and different sounds make me feel way different and could keep me awake, I found my perfect ‚Äúmix‚Äù the 3rd day I had this, so I shared this app with my girlfriend, and same with the ‚Äúmix‚Äù and we both can sleep well to it, great job on this app

Content: It‚Äôs so cool that you can mix sounds and adjust their volume individually to make your own mix. You can save it to your profile to find it again easily. I‚Äôm surprised this app is free! It‚Äôs awesome! It doesn‚Äôt drain your battery. There are A LOT of really good sound options. I am starting to use this app every night now since it helps me sleep so well.
Title: Best!

Content: This is my favorite sleep sounds app, both my husband and I sleep so much better when we have it going. It‚Äôs become a standard part of our night, my favorite feature is I can set the app to shut off after a certain period of time so it‚Äôs not keeping me asleep when I need to be getting up in the AM üòâ.
Title: A Nightly Must Have

Content: I always play the same tune, and set it for 10 min and I am sleeping instantly! I could never sleep before because my mind was constantly running and I couldn‚Äôt stop thinking. This app allows me to focus on something else, which helps me relax and sleep! Use it every night, and recommend it to everyone!

Content: I have only been using relax melodies for about a month now and can honestly say I am getting better sleep than I ever have. Another thing I don‚Äôt like is that some sounds are enabled to play, but you can‚Äôt actually play them. Then there are some that are disabled unless you upgrade. Why not just disable the ones that I can‚Äôt actually play? Doesn‚Äôt make any sense. I deleted the app and downloaded something a lot simpler, which is why I rate this one star. Don‚Äôt need to make something simple complicated.
Title: Glitchy and weird sound

Content: I‚Äôve used quite a few different relaxation apps before going to sleep. This one provides many many combinations of options of sounds that you can customize completely. You can mix and match different sounds to create your own ambience can really help you relax and go to sleep.

Content: I love how easy it is to create your own layered sound mixes with this app. The free version has tons of sounds to choose from and you can really feel transported. My only negative to note is that the sounds are too loud, even when I adjust them down almost all the way. I end up turning my phone volume down but then I am nervous I won‚Äôt hear my alarm in the morning.

Also, the timer is more difficult to set than the older version. Overall, a good app for a sound machine, and look forward to more improvements.
Title: Good app. I use it every night.

Content: I have a constant ringing in my ears that makes it impossible for me to fall asleep in dead silence.  My doctor recommended I listen to something like white noise to drown it out. This app allows to change your selections, its with you when you travel and hasn't given me any issues on my iPhone. It's versatile and easy to use.

Content: I pay for the premium plan which I feel is a bit steep. However, I love falling asleep to stories I wish they would add new stories more frequently. None the less I listen to them every single night. Outside of that occasionally at work I will use the sounds to create some white noise to distract me from the loud noises
Title: I use it every night

Content: This app is not the best I love it and it helps me fall asleep it is just that my mixes aren‚Äôt working which is really disappointing but they just sent me an email and they said sorry so now i kinda love this app because how kid they are there is also ALOT of things where you hav3 two pa6 to get so 8 can onl6 get like ten things but other than that so far it is a really good app

Content: BetterSleep is a great app if you want a sound machine but don‚Äôt want to buy anything. Obviously you have a lot more options with the premium but without it is just fine. Title: Awesome

Title: I don‚Äôt really pay for apps but this is still fantastic free

Title: insomnia FREE.

More than half of it is only for premium. Also, paid premium accounts are not supported by family sharing. It‚Äôs highway robbery.

The choices in sounds are awesome though and helps me sleep better and fall asleep faster.
Title: Great white noise, low unpaid perks.

Content: Everything was great and I could play this as background to audiobooks so when the sleep timer turned off the book the sounds from your app would continue. Now when I start a book it immediately stops your app from working. üòî

I'd suggest a few improvements like fading the sounds more slowly when you set the clock to exit the app at night, as well as linking to outside sounds like ambient songs.

Title: Helps me sleep so well

Content: I literally cannot go to sleep without listening to this app it‚Äôs so relaxing and not in a creepy asmr way (sorry if you‚Äôre into that, I just don‚Äôt vibe) it‚Äôs like just normal stuff that if people saw it they‚Äôd be like ‚Äúwow ur cool‚Äù ya know? Title: Best EVERRR sister superb

Content: This app is wonderful for helping not only myself but my kids as well to fall asleep and stay asleep! Title: Loving it!

Title: Great relaxation

Title: Crashes-Update

Title: Please

Title: Please create Alexa skill!

Content: This app was not what I personally needed. Cancelled the same day. Quick to send an email about new subscription but no verification of cancellation . Gives an uneasy  feeling of legitimacy. Please send an email when cancellation occurs. Waiting 2 days for verification. Update: I appreciate the response from the developer. Assured no worries. I would still request a cancellation notice to not be concerned about billing. I added a star for response but was not assured of cancellation verification
Title: Verification of cancellation

Content: I had this app not that long ago and most things were free and now I have to pay so much for practically everything. It doesn't make any sense to me on why I would have to pay so much for it now. If I am going to have to pay 60-40 dollars for 99% of the things on here I don't get why we don't have to pay for the app instead of paying for most things on the app. I know there is a free trial and you think that I am going to want to buy it after 7 days, but I am not going to pay $60 just so I can listen to music to calm myself down.
Title: Not Very Satisfied

Content: I have always loved this app. While I‚Äôve never paid for a full subscription, I like that I can still listen to certain sounds. It seems like the free selection has gotten smaller in a short amount of time and that made me sad... still love the app though but I am looking for a different app now.
Title: Relax

Content: I have been using this app for years to sleep better.  Today the sound stops after about 1 minute although it shows as playing. I turned off bluetooth, rebooted the iphone, and reinstalled the app.  It still stops playing sfter about 1 minute.  How can this be fixed?  Thank you.

Title: I‚Äôve honestly been using this app for 7 years now

Content: I love the update that y‚Äôall have made over the last few years.  I just wish that y‚Äôall would have some lower pitch music.  All of the high pitch stresses me out more than relaxes me. I have been using the same meditation since 2017 and i opened my app today and i am no longer able to listen to it without purchasing a membership thing. i am really disappointed in the fact that i have been using this app without a problem since 2016 and now i won‚Äôt be able to sleep.
Title: you have to pay for everything

Content: Very helpful app it helps me find my peace it helps me relax and release bad vibes I really enjoy it. I am just soo so glad I found this app. And also it‚Äôs free no need for money
Title: Melodies

Title: I think I‚Äôm in love! And it‚Äôs just the FREE version!

Content: When I first downloaded this app, I paid a ‚Äúlifetime‚Äù price to unlock everything forever. Well, forever ended at the last update. When I try to open choices I‚Äôve used before, it takes me to a price screen. Thinking about deleting the app and finding one that will stand by their word!!
Title: Helps me sleep

Content: And that you can adjust the volume for each sound; makes it very customizable.  I can actually create my personal "white noise" Update: I have been using this consistently for years now and even play it as my back ground sounds with other hypnosis apps.  Love it and thank you for a great app
Title: A great selection of sounds

It‚Äôs absolutely wonderful and I definitely recommend it. It has timers that close the app if you fall asleep, it has a wide variety of settings and sounds for free, and it‚Äôs very simple to use. Title: This app is awesome.

Content: I have had this app for a very long time and have enjoyed it. Imagine my surprise when I went to use it today and realized that all of my mixes we‚Äôre gone and I was told that my lifetime membership was no longer valid. It is asking me to pay more money after I already bought a lifetime membership when I Purchased the app. I hardly ever spend money on apps and this is one of the times when I thought the app was really worth it. Now I see I am locked out of most features and I‚Äôm not about to give them more money at this point.
Title: Disappointed

Content: I fall asleep to the ocean every night.... I‚Äôve had problems with falling and staying asleep for decades, taking every prescription sleep aid, homeopathic and herbal remedies. Yoga, meditation, a glass of wine, hot bath or shower. NOTHING WORKED.... until I tried this app. My thanks to the developers.... finally, a good night‚Äôs sleep and feeling rested in the morning.  Thank you, thank you, thank you....!
Title: Relaxing Melodies app

Content: This application is amazing! And that‚Äôs saying something seeing as I never keep music apps for more than a week! I really love it and it really helps me relax when I need it to! Content: Best app for creating nice little looping ambient soundscapse. The loops are seamless. The options are fun and easy to use. My main complaint is the subscription method of obtaining all the sounds. But I guess ongoing support is needed. I just don't need another subscription in my life. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è That said... Enough sounds are available that if you're into this kind of thing, it's worth it. And there are plenty available in free and basic.
Title: Nice

Content: Every Night I cant sleep. I think it‚Äôs insomnia. I tried everything but I couldnot sleep. And Finally I got sonething that can make me sleep in 15-20 mins. I play this on my bluetooth speaker and set timer to exit app in 30 mins. I never know when did the app got exit. I recommend this app for everyone who cant sleep. Title: The best meditation app out there

Content: This app works wonders for me! I‚Äôm the type of person who has to sleep with some kind of sound that‚Äôs calming, I‚Äôm so glad I came across this app, I‚Äôve never slept any better! I  highly recommend this app! :)

I‚Äôve actually used this app on and off for years now, and I keep coming back to it because it works.
Title: I keep coming back

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for a year or more and it‚Äôs perfect. It helps when I need background noise or to fall asleep. I have severe tinnitus, especially at night. So it was a big help to find this app to give my mind and ears quiet and peaceful sounds to focus on at night instead of the constant high pitched ringing. Definitely helps me fall asleep faster!

Title: Love it

Title: Such a wonderful variety!

Title: Relaxing

Title: Love my new sound app

Title: Amazing üíô

Content: I love this App. I need white noise to sleep, but the options are endless. You can customize the perfect ambiance to guide you to sleep. Title: Love

Content: This app I. Amazing. I thought you had to pay for everything but apparently you don‚Äôt and I love that because a bunch of apps make you pay and I really don‚Äôt like that because my mom and dad don‚Äôt let me spend money on apps and this is just a heads up, please get this app.
Title: You need this

Content: Many options to help a person fall asleep. Best sound options available, personalized mixer, as well as meditations, and great stories to pick from as well. It‚Äôll even track your sleep, if you‚Äôre interested. Hope this app will go on forever, it‚Äôs crucial to my nightly routine.
Title: Best app for sleep

Content: I love the app one of the only apps that I like , bc other ones don‚Äôt have SO many options , the only thing I would ever change is the whole premium thing , I think u should be able to use some more things without premium , tho I get it bc it‚Äôs a great app!!!

Title: Great but sometimes glitchy.

Title: Very relaxing

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for two years now. I have bad anxiety and it was the only thing that could help me rest. Title: What the heck is that noise

Content: If you are trying to get better quality sleep, BetterSleep is a soothing and easy way to get it accomplished. It‚Äôs features have a friendly and inviting aesthetic.  The alarm, sleep tracker and sleep sounds are all in one app. There are numerous sleep sound options, even story telling.

Content: I really love this app, I‚Äôve had it forever!! But the past couple weeks, every time I start playing white noise to sleep, the app closes itself and stops playing. Title: Bug fix pls!!

Title: Sooo many options

Title: I wrote this review to get free sounds

Title: I have a paid subscription- where did my account go??

Content: This is a great way to calm down my 17 month old son!  Update: still love this app 3 years later. My 3rd baby does so much better at bedtime with some white noise. I‚Äôm excited to check out some of the new features like bedtime stories when my next round of insomnia starts up. Love it!
Title: My baby loves it!

Content: I have been using this app for 8 years and it‚Äôs the best sound app I have ever used. I highly recommend this app and one of the good things is that of u don‚Äôt want to buy a subscription, they include great free sounds. This app has made me enjoy my sleep 500x better. Title: This app is amazing

Content: Hey, SharePlay, so I can‚Ä¶ sleep while I‚Äôm on the phone?? Weird, but sure, ok.   But what about the basics you STILL don‚Äôt have? Like AirPlay support so I can use my HomePod Mini as a better speaker? Or Shortcuts support so I can automate the 5 screens I have to tap through every night?  Come on, people.   [Previous review] If our privacy were so important to you, you wouldn‚Äôt collect our data. Following that with a Legal reminder that we agreed to your data collection and sharing completely negates the first sentences. I don‚Äôt know what you think is ‚Äústandard‚Äù data to collect, but it sounds an awful lot like ‚Äúeveryone else does it, so that makes it ok.‚Äù (Hint: no, it doesn‚Äôt.) And then - oh yes right at the end: you sell data to Facebook. Your developer response to me has made my impression of your service worse, not better.
Title: SharePlay, but no basics

Title: Keeps shutting off for no reason.

Content: I have sleep issues, I know that.  So I decided to try this product but it didn‚Äôt work for me... too much repetition and too busy for me.  I tried the product on a 7 day trial but they charged my cc while signing up for the trial.  I have contacted them to attempt to get a refund.  They communicated for a minute and now total silence.  No refund, no response, don‚Äôt buy this product and don‚Äôt do a trial unless you‚Äôre sure.  They‚Äôre tone deaf so you may be you‚Äôre wasting your money.  Buyer beware... they don‚Äôt stand behind the terms, it‚Äôs essentially stealing.
Title: Didn‚Äôt work for me

Like one of each category and if there realizing a part two then they put that in the premium.

Title: Great

Content: I was super tired and accidentally purchased a year subscription. Honestly, do not regret at all!! I love using the meditations to go to sleep and affirmation to wake up. Plus, mixing all the sounds together is both fun and pleasant. :) I hope they keep adding new content.
Title: Bought a year by accident- no regrets!

Content: Relax Melodies really works for me, since I have a really hard time sleeping. After I got this, I‚Äôd make my own sounds, and usually I‚Äôll base it on nature. It really works and it has a million different things to help you, so I‚Äôd recommend this to you! Thank you to the producers of this! üòÑ
Title: It Actually Helps Me!

Content: I really recommend this app.  Right when I started using this app I slept a lot better! If you have any sleep issues I recommend this app.  The only issue is sometimes in some sounds like eternity I hear a little tapping noise, but it goes away after a while usually.
Title: Awsome appüòÑ

Content: I just started using it to help quiet my mind so I could fall asleep faster.  The 2 times I have so far, I‚Äôm out before the story is over.  I do wish there was a couple more free stories available without a subscription.  The ones are free aren‚Äôt a good variety to see if I like it enough for a paid subscription.  Otherwise, great!
Title: So far so good

Content: As a newcomer to the world of tinnitus and sound sensitivity, this app has been a sanity savior. The ability to customize a wide variety of ambient sounds and ‚Äúwhite noise‚Äù has helped me mask the ringing and keep my noise level comfortable, with enough variety to keep that I‚Äôve yet to run out of new or interesting things to listen to.
Title: Endless Options

Content: After using this app for long time it is amazing I love it. But when I turn my device off while the sound is playing it turn off the sound. It takes a few tries for the sound to stay on completely through the whole night.
Title: Sleep good

Content: I‚Äôve suffered from anxiety and insomnia for several years.   The melodies and meditations in this app have improved my sleep schedule as well as quality of sleep, and I use the app on my Apple TV to listen to it during the day when I need background noise but don‚Äôt want traditional TV shows or news that would stress me out, which helps reduce the anxiety throughout the day.
Title: Sleep and anxiety relief.

Content: I have noticed that when I don‚Äôt have the sounds playing and just fall asleep to the tv, I have the craziest dreams! However, when I use this app (and use the customizable sounds) to fall asleep, I sleep the whole time without waking up in the middle of the night. My cat and dog sleep soundly with it as well!
Title: Best app to sooth anxiety before bed

Content: Going through an extremely difficult time in my life (being defrauded out of my savings by my general contractor, followed by the loss of my middle son and the potential to lose my newly built home), I developed a major care on insomnia.   This app not only helped me relax and get much needed sleep, it also became a core part of my nightly getting ready for bed routine. Completely love it.   The only reason there aren‚Äôt 5 stars is because I can find no way to contact the people running this show. I‚Äôd love to praise them personally (and to suggest a yoga nidra or hypnosis with a fey forest theme!)  Still, it‚Äôs a great app. It didn‚Äôt save my life, but it did help me get through some seriously horrible times.  <3
Title: Love this app

Content: I would rate this higher but with all the updates, I have to now pay for a yearly sub? I remember paying like $5-6 and it was amazing. I don‚Äôt need the guided meditations. I had all the sounds unlocked. Now I have to pay more? I‚Äôve been using this app for more than 7 years. Maybe longer? It‚Äôs still a favorite. Please do something to fix this issue. Thank you
Title: Long time user

Content: Very nice sounds/music app. I like that you can customize and save certain sound combinations that you have made. The only thing I don‚Äôt like is that as far as I can tell, the only subscription for premium you can get is a yearly one. I‚Äôd rather subscribe on a monthly basis, or even just make a one-time purchase for premium, rather than spending $60 a year for more sounds.
Title: Pretty good

Content: I had a hard time falling asleep and staying asleep. Laying in bed with my mind racing about random things kept me up for hours. But once this app was recommended I could just fall asleep to any sound(s) I want. I could just easily focus on the noises and not have my mind racing a mile a minute. Much love for this app!
Title: Love, highly recommend

Content: I‚Äôm impressed with this apps compatibility with my iPhone, and that it communicates and shares data with my health app. I use this app every night and especially when I‚Äôm away from home on assignments. My co workers love it too and they ask me to increase the volume of my relax melodies so they can enjoy sleeping away from home as well.
Title: Not worth $60

Content: I am really enjoying this app. So glad I downloaded it. It's got a lot of choices. My absolute favorite thing is that you can combine sounds and music together! I fall asleep to Eternity mixed with Rainy Day every night. And you can set a timer so it stops when you want it to or leave it on all night if you want.
Title: Perfect sleep music

Content: I paid for full access to this app and have used it for many years.  Recently they decided some parts of the app could only be accessed if you ordered their Pro version.  This included parts of the app I had ALREADY PAID FOR AND BEEN USING!   Now, I find I can‚Äôt access some of my regular relaxation mixes because they fall under the ‚ÄúPro‚Äù sounds!!   I can have access to them if I‚Äôm willing to pay $30 a year or $200 for lifetime access, but I had ALREADY paid for lifetime access!!!    They even offered promotions where you could earn access to new sounds if you shared or rated their product.  I did.  Now, THOSE sounds are off limits to me and part of the Pro bundle.      Very disappointing, because I like the app enough to pay for lifetime access a while back.   I guess we have different versions of ‚Äúlifetime‚Äù.  This is pure and simple FRAUD!
Title: FRAUD ALERT - Bait and switch

Content: i always have trouble falling asleep, i‚Äôve tried all the methods of turning your phone off or leaving it out of the bedroom entirely, but now i just leave this playing under my pillow, set a timer so that in 30 minutes the music will shut off, and fall asleep so fast it‚Äôs amazing. five stars, great selection of sounds.
Title: Great

Content: The app itself provides lots of different sounds that can be used to help relax you and to help you sleep. It is simply amazing. My low rating is due to the fact that I have paid for the premium plan and yet I still have no access. And furthermore, there is no good way for me to get customer support. So I paid for something that I can‚Äôt get and there is seemingly no way to rectify this. It‚Äôs a shame...this really is a great app.
Title: Great expect for one thing...

Content: For many things you have to be a pro by paying money. Otherwise this app is Excellent. You can do meditations at night and it teaches you how to breathe correctly. It is a really good app for people who can‚Äôt sleep well. The noises help you relax at night. I definitely recommend this app if you can‚Äôt sleep well at night.
Title: For many things you have to be a pro by paying money.

Content: I am so grateful for this app. Wow. Such a wide variety of sounds to choose from. So specific too! You can listen to multiple sounds at the same time and control the volume for each AND set a timer and really everything you always wanted from a sound machine app. "Distant Train" and "Oscillating Fan" put me straight to sleep.
Title: FINALLY

Content: This is a great app. Many sounds to chose. Its fun putting together the combination sounds until you find the perfect relaxation mix. Although not bad the only downfall would be the sound quality. Wish they put as much into the quality of the sound as they did with the other bells and whistles but it wouldn't be a free download. All in all great app and it works perfect.
Title: Many Variations

Content: I love this app for when I‚Äôm on the road with my daughter. Rather than one more thing to pack in her sound machine (because we already have a million things) I can simply play a custom melody on my phone. Easy to customize and save favorites, even with just the free version. Highly recommend!
Title: Great for Traveling with Kids

Content: I‚Äôve had quite a bit of trouble getting to sleep lately, this app has allowed me to get the rest that I need to keep up with busy college life. The subscription is well worth it you can combine sounds to create amazing environments and feeling. All in all, it‚Äôs the best one of these apps that I‚Äôve used
Title: Awesome!!! Worth the $2.99/month

Content: Love how I can mix my own sounds to make that perfect white noise. The premixed is also helpful when trying to pick something quickly to block out surrounding noise. I use this a lot at work when I need to concentrate on a task and don‚Äôt want the distraction of surrounding conversations. Defiant worth installing and trying it out.
Title: Great app to relax

Content: Puts me and my children to sleep peacefully. I don‚Äôt even realize I fall asleep, I just wake up the next morning refreshed! Best part is the timer, I don‚Äôt have to worry about draining my battery because the app will close by itself!!!!! Highly recommend this app! I love how you can personalize it to the perfect sound to help you fall asleep!
Title: Love it!

Content: Love the sounds, very natural and very soothing. I especially love the distant train as it makes me think back to certain memories. Tons of free options but also there seems to be great features for paid subscribers. One thing I would add is DISTANT AIRPLANE! You know that sound when airplanes pass by at their highest altitude, that delayed sound. Reminds me of my childhood and would definitely be a hit.
Title: Great app, but needs more!

Content: I enjoy being able to make my own mix of relaxing sounds. The ability to make certain sounds louder than others helps me achieve the perfect blend. I‚Äôve been using it for months and will continue to. The timer feature is amazing. I‚Äôve shared this app with several friends
Title: Love this app

Content: Best white noise app so far. Lots of great choices to mix and match! I‚Äôve tried quite a few apps and this one gives you control to really personalize as you like. Some sounds u can set to be louder and some quieter...I have my phone set up to a Bluetooth speaker and it feels like I‚Äôm surrounded by whatever environment I set! Please add more melodies please!
Title: Perfect

Content: Sometimes I have trouble sleeping at night..  every time I play the mixes I‚Äôve created and I fall asleep almost instantly! I love that you can create your own so you fall asleep or simply listen to the sounds you enjoy hearing! The app is also simple to use and has a very nice design that‚Äôs pleasing to the eye and easy on your eyes as well if you‚Äôre looking at your screen at night.
Title: Very calming!

Content: I have used this app for almost 10 years and can't imagine going a night without it. All the different sounds are so relaxing and being able to mix sounds to make your own personal sound is great. I've looked at other apps and none compare to this.
Title: Fantastic sleep

Content: My baby was absolute trash at falling asleep. I‚Äôll be the first to admit it. I‚Äôve done all the different techniques to get her down for bed. One night in sleepless desperation I downloaded this app and messed around to create the perfect symphony of slumber. Now when she here‚Äôs my sweet fire mix tape of sleepy jams, she knows it‚Äôs time for business. I am so grateful this app exists.
Title: Miracle for restless babies.

Content: These soothing sounds have been working for me for quite a while; this coming from someone who has suffered from sleep issues for 30 years. Highly recommend this app since there are so many sounds to choose from; if one doesn‚Äôt suit you, keep looking or mix some together!!
Title: Relax Melodies Rock

Content: Love this app! I use it almost every night for the white noise and isochronic tones that promote relaxation, REM sleep, and deep sleep. The sounds are realistic and amazing, some include: waterfall, vacuum cleaner, laundry dryer, and a distant train (which is SO realistic I swear it‚Äôs coming in the window from outside)! Hands-down my favorite app! Worth every penny!
Title: Still my go-to sleep app night-after-night!

Content: I‚Äôve always loved white noise, and this app has so many options so I can pick and choose to create my own personalized melody I like to fall asleep to. I don‚Äôt usually meditate, but this app makes me want to. I also love the timer feature. This app has been a great blessing and I‚Äôm really glad I have it.
Title: I use this app almost every night

Content: This app is great. The sounds are so realistic and there is a huge variety to choose from, something for everyone. Plus, you can layer the sounds. I like to layer the campfire sound with night or peepers. Never had any issues with the app. My four-year-old daughter loves the humming sound and asks for it every night!
Title: Realistic and Soothing

Content: You‚Äôre really in control! I have been happy with the sounds I was able to combine or solely use to help with sleep through this app. There is a premium option however there aren‚Äôt a lot of annoying ads promoting it, while still offering tons of free sounds. My favorite so far!
Title: Tons of options!

Content: This app is a life saver especially on nights away from home. I can turn on white noise or fan with a timer and I'm off to sleep just like home. Title: Love this app

Content: We use this app when we travel and camp to provide background noise during sleep. It helps our young boys fall and stay asleep despite activity around them. Our kids are well rested and we can enjoy making memories together.  It literally saves our vacations. Thank you!!!
Title: A life saver for parents everywhere

Content: I use this app every single night. Love the variety of sounds, there‚Äôs something for everyone! And adjusting each sound to create just the right melody for me is the best part!! Recommend this app to sooo many people I‚Äôve lost count. I manage an Integrated medicine office where the focus is on holistic medicine and homeopathic medicine and patients love it! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Try this app

Content: I recently developed a mild case of tinnitus. It‚Äôs very annoying to say the least. This app is INCREDIBLE for blocking the sound until I fall asleep.  I set it for ocean and wind. I let it run all night. It lulls me to sleep without that constant tinnitus buzz in my ears.  When I wake it‚Äôs as if I‚Äôm on a beach somewhere fully relaxed from a good nights sleep.  I can‚Äôt thank you enough!
Title: Tinnitus blocker

Content: This app is so awesome even if u didn‚Äôt pay for the extra sounds the sounds there are so relaxing and they can play for as long as you would  like I dec neatly recommend this app o have been using it for years and it really helps. I would say to download it and if u have the money pay for mor sounds! Have a good rest!
Title: Really Amazing

Content: I love love love the fact that I can combine sounds to make my own sound. I used to flip and turn for up to two hours at night, just trying to fall asleep. I have used this three nights and I have fallen asleep every time before the fifteen minute sleep timer goes off. Can't ask for more.
Title: So many sounds!

Content: Great app with many relaxing melodies. I have been using it for more than 4 years now. I‚Äôve used it to drown out noise , to help calm my newborn , in the bath etc. I use it every night and leave it playing all night long. Hands down the best app I can‚Äôt live without it. I highly recommend it!!!!!
Title: Love it and have been using it for years.

Content: I've downloaded many other relaxation app but their music never out me to sleep it relaxed me rather kept me up . I've been using this app for months and whenever I'm tossing and turning in bed from the outside noise or just life in general I listen to preset ones and also the flute on and in no time I fall asleep. Title: Music that relaxes you ...

Unlike some others I have used, this one continues to play in the background. I use it on train into city every day.
Title: Best rest machine

Content: I usually use this app when I'm having a hard time going to bed and it helps me sleep pretty quick. I set it on the 30 minutes timer and knock out way before it goes off. Also, I use it when I babysit to help get the baby to sleep! I love the fact I have so many options to choose from!
Title: Great

Content: My wife and I use it all the time to drown out noises so that we can sleep more peacefully. Helps my wife sleep in when I am getting ready for work early in the morning. Allows us to have private conversations without the kids being able to hear what we are saying too!
Title: Great app for a variety of situations!

Content: Can‚Äôt believe what a difference this makes in my ability to get to sleep faster. I use the timer function so that it turns off after awhile so it doesn‚Äôt drain my battery. I love that you can layer different sounds and there are a ton of options for sounds to choose from!
Title: This helped me so much

Content: This is a wonderful app for relaxation. I use it at home and in my work as a therapist. You can layer multiple sounds and fine tune the loudness of each one to get the perfect mix. It also has a timer function which is great for setting up a timed meditation. I‚Äôve recommended the app to several friends and family members.
Title: Awesome app

Content: After having my children a few years ago I became accustomed to noise, the fuzzy sound from the monitors, or the rain sound from the sleep sheep. I actually downloaded this app for them one night when we were away from home, but I use it now more for myself now than the kids.
Title: Very soothing

Content: I work 12hr. Night shifts and when I get home and ready for bed the sun is coming up. I used to have problems getting to sleep and staying asleep. Now however, I jus play the campfire, rain, and peepers I my quality of sleep Has increased considerably. Thanks for helping me relax and get out of my head and not have to take sleep aids!
Title: No drugs needed

Content: I‚Äôm absolutely love this app!! I‚Äôve used a lot of these kinds of apps but always end up deleting them after a few days/weeks because I‚Äôm not thrilled with them but I do love this one! I love that I can customize it to fall asleep to whatever I want and the free options are seriously satisfying.
Title: I fall asleep almost immediately

Content: I highly recommend this app! Life can get pretty stressful. This app is great to help me relax and get to sleep at night. I have even used it to help my kids get to sleep. The guided meditations have helped me fall asleep faster and stay asleep longer. This app is also great when we are traveling to provide background noise to help us sleep better. I LOVE THIS APP!!
Title: Fantastic App!

Content: So I have gotten a couple apps like this and this is the best by far you have to upgrade to pro to get all the sounds but unlike most apps it comes with like a lot of sounds to start I haven‚Äôt seen the meditation part of it yet but the best feature on this is how you can mix sounds just a great app all around
Title: HAVE TOO READ

Content: I love using the app when studying and when going to sleep. I love that you can make your own sound mixes! The timers and alarms make the app great too! The best thing is that if you turn off your phone, you can still hear your sound mix playing! 10/10 would definitely recommend!!
Title: Great for Sleeping

This app has helped me sleep so well that I feel almost energized when I wake, I sleep easily and it‚Äôs much less tossing and turning!
Title: Magic!

Content: Helps me sleep so well. I love how you can customize the individual sounds to make something that works just right for you. There is so much variety too! I didn‚Äôt know how many different kinds of rain and water sounds there were out there. Great for helping you relax and sleep throughout the night.
Title: Great app!

Content: I originally got this app because my puppy barked a lot while she was  so I listen to the music to drown out her yelping. Then I realize that this app also works for driving out background noises while you‚Äôre doing homework or reading. Overall I like the music that it has it I like making different types of music and it is really good app.
Title: AWESOME app

Content: Really like the creative options to this app and especially, that it allows you to layer with different options and with the sound level just right. Title: Soothing in some great selection-love it

Title: Relaxing

Title: Love it!!!!

Title: Grandson recommended

Content: So many sounds, I love it, my favorite sound machine app. But I downloaded this app on my droid and paid $1 for the extra sounds. I re download it on to my iPhone and for the extra sounds I gotta pay yearly? Other than that I love this app. I use it when I don't have a fan or if my nieces n nephews stay over.
Title: Since when do I have to pay yearly?

Content: It's a pretty good app! It has a lot of calming sounds to help you fall asleep. It's also so cool that you can set an actual alarm using the sounds. But it would be great if you could set the volume for each individual sound. Because some of them are too loud and some too quiet so if you could set each one to whatever you want and mix them it would be perfect :).
Title: Pretty good!....but

Content: I honestly love this app so so much, there is nothing that I would change. This app is how I fall asleep each and every night. The sounds are so relaxing and calming and I love it so much. It's a PERFECT app! I 100% recommend this!! Even if you don't want to use it to sleep, I do it in the middle of the day, too!! The sounds are so calming!! Please get this app. I love Relax Melodies so so much! ‚ô•Ô∏è
Title: PERFECTION

Content: Comes with quite a few sounds, individual volume adjustment, the ability to save your own favorite mixes, the interface is easily understandable and aesthetically pleasing and while there is a premium version the free version is very effective on its own. Helps me sleep peacefully and concentrate on my studies, definitely worth a download.
Title: Great App

Content: I already have a daily meditation practice and am always trying to encourage others to meditate.  I downloaded this app for sleep sounds, but it is so much more powerful than that.  I have enjoyed the flexibility it provides and also recommend it for those wanting to learn to meditate.

Content: This app is amazing. Even on the most stressful or anxiety-riddled days I can relax and fall asleep because of this app. Tons of sounds for everyone and can be great for meditation.
