Title: Must have

Content: I literally never do these for almost any app... but when I do. It's because the app is successful in what it's trying to achieve. This has seriously helped me just about every night. I love this app and I wish I could listen to all the sounds and everything it has to offer but even without that, It's amazing!
Title: A legit 5 stars

Content: This app provides more features than can be described here. The recent upgrade seems to provide even more features. A must-have app!
Title: Amazing App

Content: I have been suffering from sleep deprivation for 27 years. I have tried just about everything in the book, including other sleep apps. Using BetterSleep I now have been enjoying deep, uninterrupted sleep and get a full six or seven hours. It‚Äôs nothing less than a miracle.
Title: It‚Äôs Working!

Content: This app has made an incredible difference in my life. I turn on a mixture of sounds every evening at bedtime, and the relaxing sounds soon put me to sleep. If I wake up during the night, I focus again on the sounds, and soon drift off again.
Title: Can't sleep without it!

Content: I have chronic pain from illness. For years I don‚Äôt sleep much. Allergic to RX sleep meds. Someone recommended this type of therapy since my biggest issue is quieting my mind. First night success. Slept longer without wake ups and as I was struggling to get to sleep the music kept random thoughts away.
Title: Great For Sleep

Content: .. it keeps crashing in the middle if a meditation or a story. Repeatedly. This app worked perfectly from October ‚Äò22 til January 2023 and now it won‚Äôt stay on more than 5 minutes unless I‚Äôm lucky. All the best sounds, stories, etc. LOVE the mixer and the hypnosis. I just want it to work. And also make it easier to find my custom mixes (I know it‚Äôs possible but it‚Äôs not intuitive- run through the UX w someone new)
Title: Great app but

Content: This app has helped me sleep numerous times now and it produces pretty much any sound or atmosphere to your liking. I‚Äôm only on the free version too so there is so much more to offer, you may want to consider buying the advanced version. It‚Äôll be worth it!
Title: Wonderful sound selection

Content: I love the sounds and customization! Great work to let users curtail to their desires. Unfortunately, the app is let down by a pretty UI that is poorly designed.   Lots of scrolling side to side, messy configuration windows, poor handling of multiple audio streams concurrently, and, seriously, why is there no output control?!  I have to start the playback, lock the device, and, then I can choose a homepod or other device. It's a simple button provided by Apple to make UX-friendly experiences.  I'm tired of getting blasted by my phone audio output when I want to play to an external device. All of the major competitors to this app use that API so users can set the output BEFORE tracks begin playing.
Title: Great sounds, terrible UI

Content: I really enjoy the sounds feature and have been playing them every night. I sleep so well with them! And I enjoy creating whatever noise I want :) looking forward to more releases of sounds. I have yet to try bedtime stories, but I absolutely love this app
Title: Sound Asleep

Content: I‚Äôm a 100% permanently disabled combat veteran who dread bedtime because it usually takes 45 minutes to an hour to just fall asleep. But after using this app for the past week I‚Äôve noticed a change in the time it takes for me to fall asleep.
Title: Outstanding App!

Content: I suffer with PTSD and so tired of taking all the medication that is supposed to help me sleep and cope with being in the ‚Äúreal world ‚Äú  But as soon as I started using this app I have been able to sleep without as much medication and it seems to be helping while I am awake also.
Title: It works! !!!!

Content: I listened to the app all night long, 2 nights in a row. I slept all the way through from 9:30-6. I usually wake up numerous times during the night. Woke up refreshed, haven‚Äôt felt like that in years. Going to try a different choice tonight and see if I get the same result.
Title: The best deep sleep

Content: From binaural rhythms to body scans and imaginative stories; the options are endless and I‚Äôve never had a dull experience using this app. I‚Äôve been a premium subscriber for at least three years and always find something new and creative.
Title: Wonderful experience

Content: I just downloaded this app (trying the 7-day trial) and I love it‚Ä¶ BUT it keeps crashing. I‚Äôm not sure what the glitch is, but if it continues to randomly shut off, I‚Äôm going to cancel my subscription. That said, the way you can customize your sleep mix is absolutely amazing. So calming.
Title: Great but‚Ä¶

Content: As my husband and i have gotten older our sleep patterns have changed. this app has helped us achieve more consistent sleep simply by playing it at night. what started as a way to sleep when. or at home has now become our nightly routine.
Title: It‚Äôs part of the nighttime routine

Content: I love this app, I fall asleep easily with it at night. Gives me some weird dreams, but overall helps me sleep better. I wish I didn‚Äôt have to pay for everything especially since you can‚Äôt even preview the sounds, music, etc. Love the app though.
Title: Love the app, wish I didn‚Äôt have to pay for almost everything

Content: Tired of just white noise or someone‚Äôs voice telling you to relax? Mix your own sounds. Millions of combinations plus binaural plus guided meditations. No monthly fees - one fee. I own most of the meditation apps and this is the best. If you can‚Äôt find satisfaction here perhaps yoga or jogging is better for you.
Title: Great choices and mixes

Content: I love this app so much! I love the art style as well! But I do wish more was free. I listened to all the free stories at least a hundred times! And I do want more free stories to listen to. Other then that this app is perfect! I love it so much! Thanks to all the developers and whoever else helped with this app, including the people who responded to each and every review, love the effort! ‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: One problem

Content: I have relied on this app to sleep for so many years. Used to. I have had to constantly repay for this app, constant glitches, constant updates. Title: This helps

Content: I‚Äôve used it twice so far and so far no issues. With that said - I‚Äôm incredibly impressed by the sound options and quality, especially with a free app. As of now I would totally recommend (and I‚Äôll try to update this review if that opinion changes).

Title: Just right!

I love this app.
Title: Love this app

Content: I love this app so much! The sounds are so realistic and incredible and I love how it's a endless loop! Title: Relaxing

Content: This is the best app ever I seriously would fall asleep so quick I enjoy listening to all the sounds and different sound they have it makes it easy for me to choose what I‚Äôm in the mood for it to listen to I think everybody should have his app if they have trouble sleeping if they are far away from home
Title: Yassss

Title: Perfect!

Content: I've been working to try to find ways to live a more peaceful existence and in the midst of a classroom full of inner city students who bring the chaos of violence and poverty into the school from their homes and communities this can - more times than not - produce a calming effect on the whole room. Much needed by all of us. Thank you.
Title: Thank you!

Content: I was amazed at how realistic the rain sound was and I love that it is interactive as well. Overall glad to have rain storm one click away

Content: Very good sounds, best sleep aid app that I‚Äôve used. Has a big selection of free sounds, and even more if paid. Only con I have is that the musical sounds loop too quickly, in other words after 20-30 secs it repeats and for me that‚Äôs a little distracting. If they were bumped up even to a minute or a little more it probably wouldn‚Äôt be noticeable. But other than that, I love it!
Title: Exceptional

Content: I've always had a difficult time achieving deep restful sleep. Waking up every 30 minutes or so all night long. The sounds on this app when mixed help out me in a trance like state. Allowing me to get several hours of uninterrupted sleep. I still haven't gone a full 8 hours yet but this app is great.
Title: Really helps with deep sleep

Content: I have tried apps like this before but found the sounds very generic and not that relaxing. Relaxing melodies has a very large range of options and you can create thousands yourself. There are so many unique sounds that you can find truly relaxing. I recommend it... it‚Äôs wonderful
Title: Wonderful and relaxing

Content: this has been my FAVORITE sleep app for years! i'm so glad they added more sounds, the price is well worth it. the combinations are endless. i even have a calming playlist for when i'm doing homework or just trying to read and relax! i love it so much it's the only app on my lower iphone icon bar! :)
Title: the best sleep app there is!

Content: There are a lot of sound apps out there but this one is by far my favorite. I love being able to mix and match tons of sounds, have favorites I can easily access, as well as find ones made by other users. I use this app while I‚Äôm studying, trying to sleep, and meditating. Highly recommend!
Title: FAVORITE SOUNDS APP

I suffer from insomnia and it really helps to put me to bed.. rain sounds in general, I like the rain mixed with the fireplace sounds.. I set the timer for 35 mins so it can turn off and not drain my battery and within 5 mins I‚Äôm asleep. Great, great app!
Title: Puts me right to sleep!

Content: I really struggle with shutting down at the end of the day. I only have the basic version but they still provide a wide selection of soothing sounds and background noises. The guided meditations are a huge bonus as well, they get me out of my thoughts and make me focus on my body and getting my mind to a peaceful place!
Title: I love this app!

I hope to upgrade at some point and use the sleep meditations they have, but now I use this app for basic relaxation.

Having the ability to hear the sounds that match the moment is more than I could have asked for in an app!
Title: Happy Customer!

Content: This app has helped me get back to my happy place honestly. I have trouble relaxing at night these days and this lovely app has fixed that like nothing else has. I can actually shut off my thoughts (very very very hard feat for me) and drift off soundly. Definitely would recommend to others.
Title: Sleep is my Sanctuary

Title: Thanks for the newest way to unwind!

Title: Soothing Sounds

Overall happy with app and would suggest buying it if you want a few more options!
Title: Good Selection of Sounds if Purchases

Title: It's good!

Content: I would literally never survive without this app. I have been using it for over 5 years as a lifetime subscriber and have become basically dependent on this app to sleep. It has amazing sound mixing abilities with tons of ways to customize. Best sleep app out there!
Title: Worth it!

Title: Only way I get to sleep!

Content: Still on the free trial level and am considering upgrading. I like how you can isolate and remove (or increase) certain sounds on a soundscape. I‚Äôve been using the brown noise for a few nights and find it very relaxing. Easy and beautiful interface.
Title: Liking it so far

Content: I had concerns I couldn‚Äôt listen to this app plus other music apps simultaneously, but it seems they‚Äôve added a feature recently that allows this. Truly thankful for that. Their team followed up with my concerns with kindness even when I was cranky! Major kudos.
Title: Lovely

Content: This app has helped improve my overall health. I appreciate getting feedback on the quality of my sleep and being able then to make decisions about when I might benefit from going to bed, and how much rest I really need to be healthful.
Title: Restive

I‚Äôm not saying all of it but just a few more options.

This app has the perfect sounds and settings to allow me to drown out their noise and listen to peaceful sounds so I can sleep. The only reason I took off a star is because most of the sounds require the subscription.

I can‚Äôt believe what a difference this is making for me!

Title: I like it but

Content: I am a new person after using this app regularly for over two years. By far the best part of my day is crawling into bed and listening one of the wonderful features of this app. It‚Äôs worth every penny to upgrade the app.

Title: Very relaxing

Title: Amaziingggg

Title: Relax melodies

I‚Äôm not paying to go ‚Äúpro‚Äù this is unfair! I get that you wanna attract more people and get better income but seriously? Your gonna charge me double? For the SAME thing? I don‚Äôt think so!

If you‚Äôre a free app, don‚Äôt hoard the good stuff for subscription members. Pink noise and brown noise are just white noise on a different frequency. Those should be included on a sliding scale to include red, green, blue, etc.
Title: Comprehensive

Content: This is the perfect sound machine. It allows you to customize your mix from different sounds and save it to your profile. I use it frequently for white noise to help me sleep when I travel and for a music box for my little one. There are really so many options!

Content: I find it hard to sleep in total silence. I need soothing background sounds. I‚Äôm glad to have discovered this app, because I use it literally every night. The selection of sounds is good, and I like being able to create my own custom mixes. It‚Äôs easy to use.
Title: I use this app every night

Content: Has all the sounds you need when you need them. I‚Äôve had this app for years and always loved it. It never has issues. Does take a good chunk of battery to use for long periods of time. Meditation, sleep, studying; this app has something to listen to to fill your ears with lovely sounds

Title: Relax Melodies

Title: üí§

Title: Good timer

Title: Not Good

Title: DOWNLOAD NOW

Love being able to make the custom blends for what is soothing to my mind and see what others have made.

Content: This app has been great for providing a variety of combinations that help me tune out distractions in the office and focus on a project as well as helping me clear my thoughts and slip into sleep effortlessly at the end of the day. I like that I can create combinations that work for different needs and save for quick reuse.

Content: It‚Äôs by no means perfect but I love all the options and the mixing and the alarm customization. I also really enjoy falling asleep to the sounds as well as working to them. I am constantly using it.  You can even build customized sound layers and favorite them to use later. It‚Äôs just great!

Content: I love this app!  There are only a handful of apps I use daily...my calendar, bank, weather, and Relax Melodies.  It‚Äôs awesome that you can layer sounds.  My fav is ocean + flute...who knew that could be a thing?!?  Even when I‚Äôm just needing to lay down for a 20-minute power nap, I use this app and it‚Äôs like Pavlov Dogs result...Relax Melodies = rest/sleep, and I‚Äôm out!
Title: Customize your sleep noise!

Content: I‚Äôve had the premium version awhile.  I have a difficult time getting to sleep. This app is great. I found that listening to the same music night after night, after a while doesn‚Äôt do the trick. This give me a very large number of sounds to choose from.
Title: Great sounds

Content: Great app! Love the versatility and it doesn't use a lot of battery either. I love that it allows you to choose as many sounds as you want, and volume for each one too. No complaints. Great for helping me fall asleep at night or when I‚Äôm trying to block out others‚Äô noise when studying.
Title: Great app.

Content: This ap is user friendly with a ton of options and sounds that help to get you relaxed. I‚Äôm a marriage and family therapist who has a lot of racing thoughts at the end of the night and his app has helped to calm hide thoughts and get me to sleep. I recommend spending the extra money to get the additional meditations also!!
Title: Great app

Content: I love the fact that you can mix your own sounds to get the perfect combination of sounds that work best for you. To add the meditation sessions are absolutely amazing! I fall asleep within minutes every night using this app!
Title: Great variety of sounds and the meditation works better then anything I‚Äôve ever tired.

Content: Been able to get into a deep sleep for longer since using this app. I am very great full for that.  I would love to have a timer for it that way it can shut off before I need to wake up.  Other then that it is fantastic. Lots of sounds so you can make a very good and unique bed time sound.

I just use the free version, as the "pro" sounds look to be mostly electronica which I personally don't find at all relaxing.
Title: Intuitive interface

Content: Use this app for both myself and my baby now. It works like a charm in keeping him sleep during his naps and I night. I can get things done around the house without disturbing him now. I love it! Wish it didn‚Äôt have a monthly cost for the Pro. If it was a one time fee I would def buy it.
Title: Bought it for my baby

Content: Love this. Especially the night sounds and thunder as well as the fact that you control the volume of each sound and can combine them. I set the timer for 30 minutes and I am asleep before it quits. Been having trouble sleeping...still awake in 2 or 3 hours. Love this app!!!

Content: This app is just what I need! It allows you to make a mix of your own sounds and stuff, play around with them, and you can play them for a long time! The only thing though, in case your wondering, is that there are a FEW things that are additional that you can buy.
Title: Beyond great

Content: Was about to get a sound machine which I really did not want but needed something to help drown out noises from neighbors who had a much earlier schedule than I. This definitely helps, does everything the machine would do and more, portable and I don‚Äôt have to have another ‚Äúthing‚Äù in my home.
Title: Helps me sleep

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for a few years now and I love the freedom I have with this app. Even in its earlier stages, it did what it was meant to. Now with the new meditation features, it‚Äôs almost perfect. I would love to see a variation of sounds like the piano, zen, lounge, orchestral, etc. That would give me a variety of choices every day.
Title: Great app

Content: I downloaded this app while traveling because we are use to a loud fan at home. The hotel we stayed in was noisy and it made it difficult to rest. This app saved the rest of the trip. Use it every time we travel now. Great variety of sounds/noises to pick from making it very versatile.
Title: Great for travel

Content: I am relatively new to the app, but so far the wonderful array of sounds is my favorite part.  They are very calming and so diverse that I can always find something to calm or inspire. Title: Helpful app

Content: Love this app - so many free options and it puts not only baby, but momma right to sleep, as well!!! Every time they update, the app gets better than I could have imagined. The developers are amazing and we are fortunate to have such a wonderful tool free at our fingertips.

I only wish that there were more sounds available for free, but the ones they have now are Very good and the combos are endless so I have nothing to complain about
Title: Relax melodies

Content: I love that there are numerous sounds to choose from and mix. I haven‚Äôt used the paid version so there are limited options to choose from, but even then I feel it‚Äôs plenty to choose from and it helps me relax before bed.
Title: I feel like the DJ to my dreams

Content: I‚Äôm really enjoying the options in the app. It‚Äôs worth the money IMHO. The different color noises (brown, green, white, etc. moved in w/ different beats & times allows me to DJ my way to sleep, study, tune out& focus, etc. The different stories also helps to put me to sleep s well.

Content: This app is just wonderful for creating music and sounds to fall asleep and sleep to. I love also all the options for noise and other great stuff for meditation and relaxation. I have never been disappointed to renew my subscription for 2 years now.
Title: Awesome sleep app!

Content: This app has the best selection of high quality sounds, and the best sound mixing. But it is a pain to use. There are so many layers of features that it‚Äôs hard to navigate and inefficient. It‚Äôs also slow to load. I wish they had a lightweight version for people who just want the same 3 sounds every night.
Title: Bloated app, complicated user interface

Content: I have loved this app so far. There are so many different features . . . and they do exactly what they claim! I am falling asleep more quickly, sleeping better, and the brainwave frequency feature has helped me improve my focus on task I typically find difficult.
Title: Really helpful

Content: Overall this app is really great. It has some cool features. But some of the sounds that are included with premium shouldn‚Äôt be in premium because they are basic sounds and it kinda frustrating that you can‚Äôt use them without paying for them.
Title: Better sleep review

Content: I love this app and recommend  It to everyone. I use River for sound next to my bed. I do meditations and I also listen to the stories. I love it for traveling   I walk through airports listening and take naps on planes. It‚Äôs been a staple in my life for years now.
Title: My everyday and night go to!

Content: Love the option for sounds and it actually works! Interested to try more like how the military trains you to fall Asleep in 2 minutes, but right now I can say the focus variety and the fall asleep quickly track are spot on.
Title: I was skeptical but‚Ä¶. Wow

Content: I‚Äôm loving the mediation/hypnosis features!  Big improvements since I first used the app!  However, I am disappointed that meditation minutes are not pushed to Apple Health to track overall recovery better.
Title: Wish it pushed meditation minutes to Apple Health

Content: I used to love this. Used it every night. I noticed that the number of free sounds was going down, but it was okay. Nothing too bad. I found 3 sounds and no music that were free. I loved this app. Developers if you read this, please, don‚Äôt make us pay for our sleep.
Title: This app is no longer what is used to be

Content: This app has great sounds and is easy to use. Plus there‚Äôs great customer service/support. They listened to their users and added a switch that can allow it to play in the background behind other apps. Great app!
Title: Plays behind other Apps!

Content: Love using for sleep in addition to ambient sound. I have 2 bengal cats, and they need lots of stimulation so I leave it on a lot for them. If using for sleep, I would definitely try it out with headphones or earbuds‚Ä¶it‚Äôs a completely different experience.

Content: I‚Äôve never tried an app like this before. Better Sleep has so many options. It also can record my sleep patterns which can be helpful in discovering sleep issues. It‚Äôs very user friendly and I highly recommend it.
Title: Great sleep!

Content: I was a huge fan of the Seasonal App that had different sounds for each season and also had Christmas sounds. I would truly love the Better Sleep App & renew it yearly if they would bring the sounds from that old app into this app as well! Otherwise, this app is good and I‚Äôd recommend it.
Title: Miss the Seasonal App from Better Sleep

Content: I live this app you can turn off you phone and the music still plays I‚Äôm about to go though my first night with it but so far no complaints! Definitely worthy of your download! Just got thought my 2nd night only complaint is you can‚Äôt hear the recordings without premium:(
Title: Best sleep app ever

Content: Scrolling through the menu I was able to select a program for my current needs. I also identified others that I imagine would be useful. Easy to listen. Soothing.

Content: I actually really like this app. i have downloaded many apps to try to help with my sleep but so far this is the only one that actually helps. the main thing i like is there are so many different things you can use even for people who haven't paid for the subscription.
Title: Good

Content: I love this app but the only problem that I had was when the alarm would ring. Title: Alarm

Content: I love this app it helps me sleep when I‚Äôm not so tired and this is great because this is what I needed.     Can you please make some songs free because my mother is not gonna pay for all this and she‚Äôs saving up for my birthday and she says she has money problems right now.
Title: great app

Content: I love this app! I‚Äôm used to sleeping with a fan on at night but when I‚Äôm traveling, this is the perfect substitute. There are so many options and the app is so easy to use. No matter what types of sounds you enjoy, they will definitely have it!
Title: Simple and effective!

Content: Almost everything is locked (didn‚Äôt use to be this way) unless you pay the 60$. Totally powered by greed at this point. Title: Totally worthless unless you‚Äôre willing to pay $$$$$

Content: this app has a HUGE variety of sounds, meditations, and stories. i have had some technical difficulties with it though - randomly starting/stopping the meditations, trouble mixing sounds, and one time all my saved sounds went away and i couldn‚Äôt access them but a support person helped me.

Content: With this app playing in the background a light sleeper like myself that works overnight and sleeps during the day I don‚Äôt wake up nearly as much as I used to. I feel better rested for my long nights at work after using this app

Title: App crashing

Content: With so many useful relaxing options, it‚Äôs easy to customize your experience for best combination that works for you. Simple to change it up when you like as well. Makes falling asleep ezzzeeezzzzzzz....

Title: Must have

Content: This app is the perfect way to put our baby to sleep at night! It helps relax Mom and dad too! Love the variety of sounds and the fact that you can combine different sounds to make your own relaxing mix!

Title: Used to love it

Content: Ok so I‚Äôm 10 and you kidda have to get the premium and I think this is a really good app but it is not free and my parents can‚Äôt pay that much money for this app but I am only giving it 3 stars because I like the dream music one like if you go it music it will say dreams and I like that one a lot but if you don‚Äôt like music and you can‚Äôt do the subscription then this is not the app for you simple as that
Title: Ok.... not good enough for 4or 5 stars tho

Title: The best

Content: The name of this app says it all!!  So many different choices to fit all individuals! Content: Helps me study and fall asleep faster. It‚Äôs very relaxing and being able to pick my own sounds allows me to customize according to my mood. Been using it for years and after 50 times of the app asking me to rate it, I give it 5 stars.
Title: Me like

Title: 5 Stars

Title: Relaxing

Content: I love this app, but for some reason the sound turns off at 7:30am every day. Title: Why does it stop at 7:30?

Content: I love this app. I use it to help my five month old baby fall asleep. It‚Äôs so soothing for her. We use it at night time, nap time, even in the car. I also love the stretches it just added and all the customization you can do. This has quickly become one of my most used apps.
Title: Perfect for babies!

Content: I suffer from Insomnia all my life and now that I‚Äôm at the change of life it‚Äôs worse. I read the reviews for this app and was a little skeptical at first, however to my surprise it actually relaxes you. I‚Äôve tried this only a few times but I will definitely use this in the future!!
Title: Very soothing!

Content: The app has a variety of sounds to choose from. I love that I can mix them together as well - if I want city ambience with rainfall, I can! Relaxing lullaby and gentle wind? You got it! Title: Love this app!!

Content: Many quality sounds are available for free to select and combine together to customize your own unique listening experience for sleep, relaxation or background noise. Also a wide range of sounds and music is available for small purchase. Great App!
Title: Quality Sound App

Content: This app is easy to use and lets you mix and match sounds. I use it when I forget my white noise machine when I travel. Title: Easy

Content: I tried the meditations and music provided throughout the night. I suffered from chronic insomnia from complex post traumatic stress and am unable to take medications due to sensitivities. I rely on natural means to help me rest. Prior to subscribing I used various meditations available free on you tube. However, this one has been the most effective.   Thank you!
Title: Review

Content: Besides having a ton of sounds you can blend you own favorites. I very much enjoy the meditation feature. I use it before sleep and on stressful days. I also use the timer. Sometimes I don‚Äôt fall asleep in 10 minutes, so I change the sound slightly.

My issue is with the fact that they have turned a lot of the sounds I used and love into Pro sounds. If you want to create new sounds and make them pro that‚Äôs fine but don‚Äôt make already existing sounds Pro. It makes me very mad that I am expected to pay for things That used to be free.

Content: There are quite a few options of sounds to choose from. I love how you can pick your own mix and put different sounds together. I got the free version and it works great! If there were other sounds you wanted then you could always pay for it.
Title: Very relaxing!

Content: This app has so many sounds! You can combine them and mix the volume for the multiple sounds you use at once. It is seriously incredible. I use it for my baby continually while out in public so she will sleep long and well. I love this app! I even use it for myself!

Content: I love this app because it helps me fall asleep and it doesn‚Äôt make you pay for the majority of the sound and you can mix sounds there is a timer so your device isn‚Äôt going off all night and it is just awesome! I definitely recommend getting this app!
Title: This is the best!

Content: I got this for myself originally, and it was nice to listen to. However, since having a baby, it‚Äôs super helpful when the little one has trouble falling asleep! Features like the fan can make it sound like our normal sleeping area wherever we are. Highly recommend.
Title: Very helpful for baby

Content: I Love these melodies so much as they have been giving my children more peaceful sleep at night. We are resting better and awakening more restored.
Title: My Children

Content: Easy enough to use. Lots of choices. I like being able to mix and match different noises however I see fit. No noticeable drop off in noise when the track loops. I'm surprised this quality is free! UPDATE: seems to have developed a pause every once in a while, a little annoying.
Title: Great noise app

I decided to buy the life long package, and sorry to say it bluntly, but I think $100 US is a VERY unnecessary price for some nice sounds on an app. I‚Äôve bought the life term package, but for a lot of people I think that this is way too much of a stretch.
Title: Too much money

Content: I‚Äôve been having a bit of insomnia recently so I downloaded the free version of this and created a few sound mixes. They‚Äôre helping me get my sleep back! I can imagine that some of these nature sounds or white noise are great to have in the background while working, reading or meditating.

The price is for a bit on the high side for my taste and I will have to decide whether the program is worth it.

Title: My fav app!!

Content: This app is awesome!  Whenever I use it, I get a great night‚Äôs sleep. This morning, I woke up early and couldn‚Äôt get back to sleep. Title: Great relaxation tool

Content: I love the diversity of sounds in the library to customize your experience. I think it‚Äôs what makes this app so beautiful. However, some of the sounds won‚Äôt even function. It‚Äôs like they‚Äôre unpressable.  I purchased the lifetime premium package thinking it might help but unfortunately it didn‚Äôt. I can‚Äôt play several sounds such as Heavy Rain, Storm, Underwater, Cat Purring, Fire Crackles, etc.  I wish I could give it 5 stars as I think it‚Äôs a wonderful app. Just fix these kinks.  EDIT: support reached out and it appears all sounds are working. Will update if something changes.
Title: Versatility. However Some Sounds Won‚Äôt Play.

Content: I love listening to sound like the rain when falling asleep. I used a plug in sound machine for years. This app allows so many options for layering or individual sounds. Title: im 23 weeks pregnant

I highly recommend this app!
Title: Wish I found this app sooner!

Content: Pros: many sounds to choose from and very customizable, timers to shut off and/or exit app, reasonably priced Cons: guided meditations are only okay... not outstanding... and somewhat inconsistent at times, would like more extended musical tones... long and flowing... that don‚Äôt repeat so quickly (can become irritating instead of soothing on such short loops)
Title: Still happy with my purchase, even with quirks

Content: There are many great apps out there, but this one by far super cedes them all! This is absolutely great for meditation. Title: It even calms my dog!

Title: Omg

Content: Has proved to be really helpful with relaxing me. I also use it to put children to sleep. It has a mixing board; you can lower the volume on one sound and increase the volume of another sound to give you the right mix of sounds that happen to fit your preference that night.
Title: Great app!

Content: The design of the app makes it extremely easy to use and all of the options available can be used to create the perfect environment for sleeping. I highly recommend this app to anyone that has problems with sleeping due to tinnitus or other issues.
Title: Great App Really Helps With My Sleep Issues

Content: Years ago I bought the lifetime membership, which have access to additional features over and above the free version. Why am I being prompted to renew?
Title: Why am I being prompted to pay for another year of premium even I paid for life?

Content: I love this app. You can make up all kinds of sounds that please you for any situation you are in. I love the rain and thunder selections together and I fall asleep to them most every night. Title: Relax Melodies

Title: Appreciation review

Content: Love the app so much, only thing i‚Äôd prefer is for there to be a way to buy specific sounds, i want a few that are premium but i don‚Äôt need all the other ones and i‚Äôm not looking for another subscription. Would love to see it
Title: Best app for rain noise

Content: I have been using thls Better Sleep app for many years.  It makes me sleep deep and trained my brain to calm down so I can get quality rest and sleep.  It‚Äôs amazing you can mix sounds and customize it!  It‚Äôs user friendly, download it NOW!üíô

Content: I work the night and have difficulty sleeping during the day, so I need a dark room with sounds to muffle the outside noises to relax my mind. Title: Great, but one problem.

Content: I love my Better sleep app!  BetterSleep allows me to  Create my personal sounds for what I need throughout the day‚Ä¶calming, relaxing, uplifting etc.  In creating my own music and sound it has allowed me to fall asleep faster, stay asleep longer and wake up refreshed.
Title: Get the app!!

Content: The app itself is just amazing! No matter what age you are it‚Äôs gonna help with what you need. There‚Äôs millions of free music you can choose! And if you need help with something you can just go to their website and get the help from the amazing staff!
Title: ‚Ä¢ I love the app it‚Äôs amazing for all ages ‚Ä¢

Title: Not to bad

Content: I‚Äôd rather destroy my hearing than my marriage. I use headphones and my own mix from this app every single night to tune out my snoring husband. I‚Äôve used this app since 2020. Title: I loved it back in 2017‚Ä¶

Title: Amazing

Title: Relaxation help for sleep

Title: I love the different soundscapes!

Title: Fantastic

Title: Great App

Content: I love this app!! I‚Äôve been having trouble falling asleep and this has helped me every night. Title: Absolutely relaxing

Title: My favorite self-hypnosis app

Content: I first found this app while in a state park cabin after realizing that I forgot my sound machine. There was sporadic Internet connection and it took over an hour to download, but I was so glad I did! I don't have to carry my sound machine with me when I travel anymore. This is so much better. I love it!!
Title: Fantastic App!!!

Content: I have tried listening to music Albums and other forms of sleep apps.  this one is the greatest out there it‚Äôs completely customizable your brain doesn‚Äôt get used to one specific song. You can change it up on the fly. It helps me sleep on the plane.
Title: The best sleep app out there

Content: I love the variety and the way it allows you to mix the sounds! I use the app to help my 4 month old baby niece to sleep and it always works! So well, that I‚Äôve been using when I sleep too! Haha. It‚Äôs really brilliant and I recommend greatly. If you‚Äôre looking for good sleeping or calming sounds, this is the app for you.
Title: Love love love!

Content: Help!  I LOVE THIS APP, but I notice that my alarm in the morning turns it off(obviously it should) but once I hit snooze on my phone alarm the relax melodies app doesn‚Äôt continue. This makes me have to hit snooze, open my phone, then open the app to continue the white noise. I am a very light sleeper and can only sleep when I have the white noise background- oscillating fan is my favorite.   I want to hear the noise continually but I literally wake up when the noise stops. Help!!  Love this app!!!
Title: Love it but wakes me up, help!

Content: Even the free version of this app is just what I need! This app is so detailed. You can stack sounds & change the volume of each one. & there are so many sounds to choose from. My favorite combo is white noise, heavy rain, & thunder! I've tried a lot of different sleep sound apps, but this is by far the best!
Title: Free version

Content: Love this app. Wish there was a way you could choose a certain number of sounds for free instead of just getting just the ones that are standard. I love the sound of cicadas but you have to get pro to get that sound. I‚Äôm happy with the number of free sounds though. I can always find something to help this insomniac to fall asleep.
Title: Wonderful

Content: ...and sleep well. I play the sounds on this app in the background while using another guided meditation app to help me sleep. And, this one I keep running for the full time I sleep. It‚Äôs great how you can mix and match sounds, and control just about every aspect of your experience.
Title: Love this app! Control great sounds

Content: I downloaded the free version a couple of years ago when my baby was born and I needed some white noise for her. It is by far the best app I've found and I tried out quite a few. Seeing the meditations is pushing me strongly toward buying the upgrade so we'll see... but I highly recommend it!
Title: Great all around!

Content: Easy interface, loads of features and sounds.  I can‚Äôt usually tell when the sounds loop on this one either, which is a major plus. Other apps with digital sounds repeat noticeably, this one is much better! Lots of choices for sound file, mixing and matching.
Title: Best one yet!

Content: I have used other sleep apps that have worked before. But never have I found an app with so much variety! And so easy to use. There are so many sounds to choose from and noise for all ages and enjoyment! You can create your own mixes and sounds to use every night.
Title: Amazing!

Content: Finally, an app that still has the white noise playing after the meditation stops! This feature alone is worth $1000! Every other app stops the background noise once the guided meditation stops... which wakes me up... so glad to have found this app which keeps the sound going!!
Title: FANTASTIC!!

Content: I love this app when I need a nap or when I need a little background noise to sleep at night. It‚Äôs easy to use and I especially enjoy the feature that lets you create your own mix of sounds, which makes it easy to personalize to your own needs.
Title: Highly recommended

Content: This app allows you to layer different sounds and adjust each of their volumes. You can make and save multiple mixes to suit your moods. I have found it very helpful for going to sleep, but have listened to it at work as well. It's free! You can't go wrong!
Title: So easy to make the mix that's right for you!

Content: I find this app super helpful to help me sleep rather than using sleeping medication. I sometimes use it to help calm my brain down (if that makes any sense) when I‚Äôm having a migraine, but I mostly use it to help sleep. It‚Äôs been really useful, and I would recommend fellow insomniacs to give it a whirl.
Title: It‚Äôs really helpful for my insomnia.

Content: This is a wonderful app if you are having a hard time sleeping. The different sounds that is provided has the ability to calm one down and obtain a good nights rest. I just focus on the sound and go right to sleep. I recommend this for the most hard-core sleep deprived person
Title: The Best Sleep

Content: Have been using a while now. Found it helpful in all kinds of situations, including to drown out hospital sounds so the patient can rest! So glad I found it. Title: So versatile!

Content: I downloaded this on a fluke one night when I couldn‚Äôt sleep. Now I use it every night and I fall asleep so much faster. Pro tip, if you use the timer so the app automatically stops playing the sounds you have to lock the phone while still on the app.
Title: Every night

Content: Appreciate the variety of sounds you can make! Found this when they stopped supporting my old white noise app and after trying at least 15 I love it. Sounds aren‚Äôt on a loop and you can layer on top of each other to make your own personalized sleepy mix.

Content: I used to have huge difficulties sleeping, and I‚Äôd be up 2 hours past when I actually went to bed. With Relax Melodies, I rarely have those kind of nights anymore. Title: Sleep

Content: This app is great. It's perfect for building a customized soundscape to relax you, calm you, de-stress you, put you to sleep, whatever you need. Content: I love this app! Great range of sounds and easy to use.  The new version though...does not save customized mixes. The former version did not do this.  I rate 3 stars vs 5 only because of this.
Title: Great app, new version has problems

Content: I LOVE this app. I‚Äôve been using it for a while now. I turn it on every night to fall asleep to. I set the timer to shut off after 5 1/2 hours and it doesn‚Äôt even drain my battery at all. If you have trouble falling asleep, I HIGHLY recommend this app. Give it a try...you will NOT be sorry.

Content: I love this app and it's variety of sounds.  I've been struggling with insomnia these past few weeks and this app has helped. It also has an option to close the app after a certain amount of time and customize/mix some of your fav/relaxing sounds  Love it!

Content: I have been using Relax Melodies for years. Every night my favorite is white noise, the second starts playing I‚Äôm fast to sleep within minutes. Since I use it on my phone when I travel, anywhere I wanna take a nap or take a good nights sleep I just play and fast asleep I go.

Title: Love!

Title: Best white noise out there

Content: I think that everyone should use this app!! I had insomnia for a long time and it was really annoying.. but then my mom found this app for me and it was like magic- I could finally sleep! READ THIS: If you do not already have this app then you should download it right now- it will change your life
Title: A  M A Z I N G

Content: One of the things that I love about this app is that not only does the free version give you a TON of sound options, but there are binural beats, as well. I seriously use this app on an every day basis, mainly to have some good ‚Äúfocus sounds‚Äù on when I am working. I highlyrecommend it!

Title: Helps Anxiety

Title: Love it!!

Content: It of course doesn‚Äôt cure my insomnia but it helps relax my mind where i can actually close my eyes and meditate. I have the free version so i don‚Äôt have all the sounds but the free version has a VERY decent amount of sounds for free! I‚Äôm impressed, you can set timers and alarms and mix and match the sounds too. Good app overall i might upgrade. I think it‚Äôs worth it.
Title: Helps my insomnia

Title: Love it so far!

Title: So helpful

Content: Usually I sleep with a fan on but I‚Äôm on vacation this week so I needed some background noise while trying to fall asleep. It‚Äôs surprising how relaxing the sounds are. There‚Äôs a variety to choose from and you can play more than one at a time. Plays all night until yo turn it off.

Content: I love the variety of sound choices and the ability to change individual sound volume on this app. I‚Äôd definitely recommend it for people who need background noise to sleep, but don‚Äôt get much use from the pre-made noises you find other places.
Title: Great for sleep

Content: Really like all the options and the sound quality is good! You get way for for their free app than any other I have found. Love this app. Helps me sleep every night! You can adjust the volume of sounds and save combinations as you like.

Title: Sleep

Title: Why I put 3 stars

Title: Love it!

Title: So many (free!) options

Content: I use this App when I‚Äôm feeling stressed out from the day and I‚Äôm getting ready to go to bed. Being able to pick the sounds that I know make me feel relaxed and mixing them together is my favorite part! I‚Äôm always able to get to sleep and sleep great when using this app!

Content: I love Relaxing Melodies. You can mix your own white noise/relaxation sounds, set a timer and save your favorite mixes. I often use this at night when my *someone* is snoring and I‚Äôm having a hard time falling back to sleep. It‚Äôs soothing and helpful. Two thumbs up as well as five stars!
Title: Wonderfully relaxing

Title: Great way to fall asleep

Title: Relaxation at its best

Title: 100% recommend

Content: I am prone to migraines and anxiety. But since I bought this program my migraines have lessened and I‚Äôm able to control my anxiety doing today. If you want to get to sleep faster you should totally give this app a try. I have tried many others but this is by far the best one so far
Title: Best sleep app ever

Content: I love the sound selections, how easy it is to create playlists, the sleep timer and the alarm.  These are all the basic functions I started using right away and I‚Äôm definitely going to look into all the other things too. It‚Äôs super easy to navigate.
Title: Best free app...with lots of features!

A+

Mind you I am aware of the irony that I write this at 4 am, I chose to so I could draw.

Title: Great

And the smart mix is my favorite‚Ä¶truly sounds like I‚Äôm outdoors listening to wind, rain, thunder and wind chimes,no annoying loop plays. Only reason I gave it 4 stars is I wish I could connect thru my Google home mini.

Content: The BetterSleep app saves me on trips when I‚Äôve forgotten my sound machine.  If I could figure out a mix of sounds that would mimic my sound machine, I would rate higher. It‚Äôs a great app to use in a pinch. I‚Äôve only used for sleep so far but should remember to use it for relaxation as well.

Content: This app always helps me fall asleep, with its many choices of mixes. Personally, I like the white noise, and the piano mix because it just gives me haunted house vibes. Anyways, This app has meditations, and lots of other coping mechanisms you could use! But yea, the best night noises app ever!
Title: Amazing!!!!

I‚Äôd love to use it to track my sleep and find out the chronotype I am. But it doesn‚Äôt have the options. :( other than that. Love the app :)
Title: Use it every day. Would rate 4.5 if I could

Content: I‚Äôve always had problems falling asleep. I would be up until 4am watching tv because I couldn‚Äôt sleep. I decided to try this app and I have been falling asleep earlier and I feel rested when I wake up.
Title: I fall asleep faster and wake up very rested

Content: This app actually helps me go to sleep the only bad thing is i never wake up hope I dont miss my bus again ü•±ü•± 4 star because i need to pay for a lot of features so i give this app a four star wish there was a different way to unlock features then rating the app but aye üòÆ‚Äçüí®
Title: Genuinely helps

Content: I‚Äôve had this app ever since it came out on the iPod touch. For years it has helped me de-stress and fall asleep with ease. The team keeps on making the app better and better! Glad to have stuck with it and been around for the ride for so long
Title: Best App Ever!!

Content: I have suffered from insomnia, anxiety, ADD, and depression since I was 16. My insomnia is something I have REALLY suffered from. I started using this app a couple years ago, but faithfully every night for the past 2-3months.  This app has a meditation for everything, bedtime stories, and an amazing selection of soothing noises you can create your own mix from.   If any of you are struggling with shutting down your brain at night or de-stressing..I üíØ endorse this app!! I use it every single night. And I am finding I sleep longer and sleep WAY faster! My wife even says I snore now..lol  Hope this helps someone. üò¥‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Insomnia godsend

Content: Still room for improvement. Would love to hear more of a variety of voices, more whispers, better stories to lull you to sleep. SEARCH feature and other options to categorize besides ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù ...like ‚ÄúNever again‚Äù and sub-categories under favorites, like male voice, female, whispered.
Title: Lots of wonderful stuff

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app off and on for about 10 years. I‚Äôm never consistent with routines, but a constant insomniac, and out of all the nature sounds/devices, this is my favorite because it has some meditation with it. Keep the quality coming.
Title: Quality for years

Content: Wish you could get premium on a monthly basis rather than paying for a whole year. Otherwise the basic version has some very good options to choose from.

Content: I‚Äôve been having the worst time with relaxing and trying to sleep at night but this app has truly helped. I can put it on and be out like a light within a few minutes of having it on. I even use it just to relax my mind during the day!
Title: I love it

Content: A friend recommended this app when I was having issues blocking the noise in the office. I really enjoy being able to put a little white noise through my headphones. This app allows me that and to mix in other types of sound.
Title: One of my go to apps to get my mind right.

Content: Omg this works I love that you can customize the sounds and it ACTUALLY makes you wanna go to sleep and yawn so much this is the best relaxing app EVERRRRR I love it definitely worth being one of your apps I love it and I tried other games and none of them were as good Tip: solve puzzles while playing the sounds it helps! üëåüèªüëçüèªüò¥
Title: Yawning

Content: Relax melodies help me fall asleep when I can‚Äôt see to go asleep. You have many sound choices of music for Relax Melodies. You can create your own mix, play more then one sound at a time, and choose the volume your comfortable with. You can set timers and alarms. I really think this app is helpful.
Title: Relax Melodies

Content: I love this app and recommend it to my patients all the time BUT if I do not close the app then in the middle of the night it starts making a horrendous beeping sound that becomes progressively louder. Ironically then disrupting my sleep! There is clearly a bug in this app that needs to be fixed! Otherwise I love this app and so do my patients! Don‚Äôt forget to close the app when you go to sleep!
Title: Beeps in the middle of the night

Content: I love this app so much! But the only thing I would change is making more things available to the people who don‚Äôt pay for the in app purchases. I am young but even to me I‚Äôm very stressed and this helps me fall asleep. But I really like this app and don‚Äôt have much to complain about!!!!! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
Title: Stress relieving

Content: This is really nice, I had to take time out to write this review to let others know that this is truly worth it, I like to study outside. So even inside my room I can set the tone to whatever outside scenery sound I want and it helps so much better with that and just mediation and sleeping!! Real talk man!!
Title: Perfection

Content: Handy when sleeping at a hotel and you have loud neighbors next door, or spectacular while trying to drown out your teenager‚Äôs rock music.  In app purchases however I have always been satisfied with the sounds that come with download.

Content: I have Tinnitus and I will sometimes use this app to help me fall asleep or even get through work. Some of the sounds are not useful as you can perceive the loop. Also, I wish you could preview the sounds that require payment as I would gladly pay for good background noise. I gave three stars because there are many free sounds where I don‚Äôt notice the loop and I like the timer feature.
Title: Useful

Content: I never believed this stuff actually helped but with this app you can combine sounds and adjust the volume for each sound to create your own unique melody. I literally fall asleep like a baby with this and wake up feeling like a $100 bill fresh off the press
Title: Try it out

Content: Baby won‚Äôt sleep without noise, and we could not find a sound machine that was a nice fit. This app allows you to customize your sound, customize your timer, and is commercial free. Highly recommend. We have it on our iPad and our phones!
Title: Excellent for Babies!

Content: As a mom of twins I was finding it hard to fall asleep now that they sleep through the night but since I‚Äôve have started using this app it has helped me a lot with falling asleep now I don‚Äôt hear my husband coming to bed and waking up more refreshed in the morning thank you
Title: Sleep

Content: This app has been a lifesaver for all the times I‚Äôm stuck in the city trying to get some shuteye, but can‚Äôt due to all the noise. Whether it‚Äôs missing the ocean in Hawaii, the crickets in Texas, or the brook behind my mountain cabin, I can always turn to the app to take me back home.
Title: Finally getting some sleep in the city

Content: This app helped me out a lot . The melodies are nice but I downloaded it for the meditations. Anyone that has a problem sleeping should try it. I wanna pay for the whole version but every time I pay for a full version of something it turns out worst then the free one .
Title: I recommend to everyone.

Content: Customizable app with a lot of options without additional purchases. Sound combinations with each part having adjustable volume helps you create just the right mix for sleeping - and you can save it for later or share it.
Title: Really works

Content: I have tried sleeping pills I have tried NyQuil I have tried so many things and nothing works to help me go to sleep , except for one thing! And that is this app , I adjust the sound to what ever I want , to the sound I want .  It relaxes me,and takes me somewhere else to the point that befor I know it I'm asleep.
Title: It's great

Content: I got this app a few weeks ago, because I was having a tough time sleeping. I enjoy that there is a large selection of night sounds‚Ä¶ And it is definitely improved my sleep. If you have a busy mind, and want to just relax and go to sleep ‚Äì this app is for you!
Title: Love it

Content: Really nice! I listen to it to fall asleep every night. I like that you can set a timer on your melody, that you can save melodies you make, how there is adjustable volume on each sound, and how there are so many sound options for making melodies.
Title: Very calming, lots of options

Content: Excellent app. Well designed and easy to use. Includes a TON of sounds even in the free version and they‚Äôre high quality. I always end up subconsciously looking for where the track loops but I actually wasn‚Äôt able to find it so far.
Title: Simple, with great quality sounds

Content: Helps me fall fast asleep with a variety of sounds. It even has a timer that will automatically stop sounds and exit the app. All of this is included FREE (which I love cause I just want the basics for now) but additional pro features are available to purchase.
Title: Absolutely What I Was Looking For!!!

Content: I have been using this app to sleep at night and it‚Äôs been great so far! The design of the app is really appealing and I love how you can pick and choose the different sounds to create your own ambiance. It‚Äôs definitely worth checking out if you need something to help you relax or sleep.
Title: Love It!

Content: I usually have trouble sleeping and use a fan, but this was the perfect addition of white noise to my sleep schedule! Love the customization options and the fact that you can time it so you don't leave it running all night. Bed time is better with this app

Content: This app includes many soothing sounds that can be combined in a variety of ways to create just the kind of mood you need for relaxation. There are also plenty of free mixes created by others, so you do not to start from scratch. Glad I found this app!
Title: Great collection of sounds

Content: I paid for the pro version and I have been using the sleep meditation and destress meditation and I have noticed a difference in my level of patience. I don‚Äôt get stressed out over small things like I used too. I wish I would have tried this a long time ago.
Title: It really helps

Content: Super helpful and has many many options of soothing sounds to listen to create and listen to your own creations combine sounds enjoy the relaxing voice and patterns if your breathing also and most  of all have a great time sleeping as this app calms you down to a well rested night time...

Content: Easy use tons of sounds that can be combined to create your own unique sound timer shuts off automatically an alarm to notify you it's time to relax. I've tried several sound apps and nothing even compares to this app.
Title: Tired different apps this is the best by far

Content: This app has given me a great sleep. But many of the cool features cost money. You still have lots of sound but, the process of deep sleep cost money and so do many other things also cost money! It‚Äôs very hard to get a five star from me so for me to have given this app a four or five I would want more features for no money. I do understand that you need to make money but still.

Content: Never written a review before, but was asked to do so in exchange for 2 new sounds and it was totally worth it. Title: Love!!

Content: If you are on the go as a therapist and forget the music or realize there is no cd or digital type of media  This is a fun and neat tool to play with to create a relaxing environment for your client  I see all types of healers and therapists of all types benefiting from this amazing free  but actually shouldn‚Äôt be app!! Great job!!!

Title: Amazing!

Content: This app is absolutely amaze!!! I‚Äôm always traveling and I want soothing sounds to help me fall asleep. This app was a life saver! I definitely recommend this to anyone who is like me and can‚Äôt sleep in a quiet room. Th ere a so many sounds to choose from and you can even mix and match different noises to meet your preference. I love it!!!!!!!!!!!
Title: Amaze Balls

Content: I love this app i use it every night before bed. I have a hard time falling asleep at night and this app has helped me turn that around. I put my ear buds in every night and listen to music along with the relaxing meditation. Definitely recommend to anyone who has difficulty sleeping.
Title: Love

Title: The Perfect Sleep Aid

Content: I love the sounds on this app. I‚Äôve always have a hard time falling asleep, until I discovered this app. Needless to say, I sleep much better now. This app helps me fall asleep, and if I happen to wake up in the early AM, this app helps me easily transition back into sleep. 5 stars, and absolutely no complaints here!

Title: Simply Marvelous

Content: I‚Äôve really enjoyed the soothing sounds on this app. When I was working I used it to manage my stress while in my office. Now that I‚Äôm home with my baby I use it for nap time when we‚Äôre out of the house. A lot of great options without having to pay for anything.
Title: The name says it all

Content: Hi I have really bad anxiety, depression and insomnia. My therapist recommend trying this app as a way to bring a calming feeling and a way to relax enough to go to sleep. Well If doesn't work 100% i would say it works about 75% of the time to stop my mind from being on overload and relax me enough to get some sleep. If u suffer gibe this app a Chance . What do you have to loose?
Title: Relax melodies review

Content: I‚Äôve tried other apps and none of them seem to work as well. I can have bad insomnia as my mind is busy and never stops going. When I play relax melodies I fall asleep in a number of minutes. It‚Äôs great for relaxation and really helps me focus in while doing work and homework :)

Content: I'm one of those people who can not sleep if it's quiet but if I have the radio on all night I don't hear my alarm. Love this app as my phone charges by the bed and I can set this app to turn off after an hour so I can hear my alarm with out other interference from other sounds.

Content: I use this almost every night. I sleep better when the melodies are playing compared to when it‚Äôs off. I really like that you can set how many hours the melodies are playing. That way I can hear my alarm in the morning and still get up.

Title: Love it!

Content: Before using this I had such insomnia but since I started using this app about 3 months ago I'm sleeping more soundly and getting to sleep within minutes. I use the meditations and the sounds and usually don't make it through the whole meditation before I'm out!
Title: Transformed my sleeping habits

Content: I‚Äôve fallen asleep to the soothing sounds of my mixes every night since I downloaded this app. Sometimes I have issues with insomnia, but when I turn my sound on, I feel much more relaxed and at peace so that I can sleep. Just find what‚Äôs right for you and you‚Äôll sleep like a baby!
Title: Awesome!

Content: One of my friends showed me this wonderful app that gives you all kinds of relaxing sounds to play when you just want to relax. It allows you to mix and match several sounds at once!  I play it when I get in bed and it really helps me fall asleep faster! I just love it!!

Love the timer options, the sounds are good.
Title: Sleep saver!

Content: Ever since I starting using this amazing app I haven‚Äôt had any nightmares or sleep paralysis. I also stay asleep all night!! I also typically wake up at the very least 5 times a night. I feel more rested and energized when I wake up in the morning.   So thankful for this app
Title: I typically have a lot of nightmares

Title: Sleep so much better

Content: I've been listening to this for over one year. I enjoy the favorites but also like to make my own & save them. I have terrible insomnia so I need to listen for quite awhile. Title: The Best

Content: My entire family uses this app at night to fall asleep. All 6 of us can't sleep without it.  The best app to get teens to fall asleep and not watch tv while falling asleep. They/we are all more rested. My mother-in-law and daughters use it  during yoga. Lovieee this app, you will too.

I‚Äôve tried several things to restart it, but nothing has worked. I will have to download another app.

Title: Best App Ever!!

Content: Updated Review: ü§òüèª Gets to keep all 5 Stars from original review! It's been awhile since I wrote my first review. Title: Return User

Content: My children use this app every night as a way to get calm and now they have a hard time falling asleep without it. They have used white noise since birth and it‚Äôs been nice to implement new sounds through the last few months.  I‚Äôm so glad we found this app.
Title: Lovely addition

Content: This app is amazing, it has everything you need to fall asleep I use it with me and my family and it helps us out so much, you can also use it just for fun to make some good music! 5/5 nothing I would remove, but could you add even more? Thanks

Content: I have anxiety and had been using Xanax and drinking wine to relax. I am reminded of camping trips in the woods and the night sounds out on country in the home I grew up in.
Title: Sleeping better now

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for years and I don‚Äôt see myself ever stopping. It‚Äôs multifunctional, has so many options for customizing the exact ambiance you‚Äôre looking for, and all kinds of other fun things like story time to really immerse yourself.
Title: Adore this app

Content: It‚Äôs a very good app and I‚Äôm sure it works very well just telling from the looks of it. However, you lack almost every single feature to where you would have to buy the subscription to get any use out of the app. I would, at the very least, like to see my stats.
Title: Good app but lacks features for non-subscription people.

Content: I decided to try this app because it had a 7 day free trial to see if it would help. The sounds are ok but just not right I can‚Äôt put my finger on it but they just aren‚Äôt realistic enough for me.  My biggest problem is I cancelled this before the 7 days, the next day in fact and they still charged me for a whole year. So there really is no free trial.
Title: Sounds ok

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for over a year. I love it. I have the free version and love the sounds available and that you can blend them together to meet sleep needs. I also like that you can save the created sounds and set a timer.
Title: Love it

Content: I‚Äôve had issues going to sleep since I left Iraq.  After I started using this product my sleeping issue is reduced significantly.  Being about to mediate has helped me a ton also.  Highly recommend.
Title: Can‚Äôt sleep without it

Content: I have been using this sleep app for years. It allows you to layer the individual sounds you like and save the customized mix. There is a wide range of sounds from which you can choose.  Highly recommend it!
Title: Great app!

Content: Since getting Better Sleep, I rarely listen to the podcasts I used to use for sleep. The stories work well and I love that the low level music/sounds continue indefinitely (if you want). Just beautifully effective at lulling me to sleep.
Title: Love it

Content: The developers have been adding new content and changed somethings around and I like it! Yea now I have to pay for some sounds I used to get free but there is so much available that I can bake do without them. I have a subscription so that‚Äôs nice but I wonder what now means for me with the new changes.
Title: They listened!

Content: I‚Äôve been using this app for well over a decade every night. Just in the last few weeks there has been a problem with it killing the battery on my phone. It isn‚Äôt my phone as I tested it with my iPad and my husband‚Äôs phone as well the app is using significantly more battery.   Can you please remove what ever the feature you added that is causing this issue?
Title: Killing battery

Content: This App was definitely more prices than I‚Äôd usually spend on an App, but I bought the family pack bc it has been helpful to my issues with falling sleep.  Now my teens also have it and utilize it as well to fall asleep peacefully.
Title: Grateful for this App

Content: Doesn‚Äôt work and they have no plans to make it work:    Update I was referring to your Apple TV version, which I was told will not be updated and you have no plans to do so. That is where I found your app in the first place. It continues to ask for me to upgrade even though I‚Äôve paid for a year and cannot get a refund. Also navigation is very difficult and inconsistent. Since I don‚Äôt use the phone app I wasn‚Äôt aware of it‚Äôs shortfalls thanks for letting me know.
Title: Crap

Content: I had been having trouble sleeping and once I downloaded the app the same night I was able to decompress and fall asleep within 15 mins of laying down. It‚Äôs not just therapeutic for nights but day time as well when meditating. I love it!
Title: Amazing

Content: I love this app. It is now essential for me to have it while staying in hotels. Always makes me feel like I‚Äôm in my happy place.   Also, the app design is just plain gorgeous. They obviously put a lot of time and effort into this app.
Title: Such high quality sounds!

Content: This app has many options and a full variety of sounds and sound combinations I have not seen in other apps. Having the ability to create the sound you need is a real plus!
Title: Best Sleep App out there!

Content: Tried out the 7 day free trial, wasn‚Äôt sure if I wanted to continue with it until last night but apparently my subscription ended today and I hadn‚Äôt gotten a chance to choose that I wanted to pay monthly and they just went ahead and charged me $60 for a year subscription. Title: Charged yearly subscription wanted monthly

Title: Love it

Content: I love using this app to fall sleep, especially when I'm working nights and need to sleep during the day. The timer is perfect and I like that you can combine sounds, and individually control the volume of each sound within the combination
Title: Excellent app

Content: Love love love this! Use it every night to sleep. So many different sounds. I don't have all the sounds and I wonder if the pay is worth it. The way you have to pay is kind of confusing but other than that amazing app!
Title: Great but could be better?

Content: You go to exotic places to get away from the noise of the the city. Or so I thought, but my recent trip brought to a place where bullfrogs literally bark all night. This app saved my sanity and my vacation and I can peacefully drift to sleep with multiple options
Title: Saved me on vacation

Content: I paid for lifetime access and cannot download pro sounds that should come with the paid version. App gets stuck on "Loading" and then never downloads the sounds. This is unacceptable and needs to be fixed ASAP.   Website "Help" link is also broken and does not direct to a real webpage for help or support.   In summary, I paid for access to pro sounds and cannot download them and when I try to get support there is no support provided. TERRIBLE experience.
Title: Terrible! Sounds not downloading

Content: Very nice wide selection of sounds and the volume for each can be controlled individually. So if you want a lot of camp fire, crank it up, with just a touch of pan flute in the background it's covered. Mix and match tons of themes and tones based on whatever you're feeling at the moment!   Very well done app!
Title: Relax

Content: Each of the selections is a good one, but I love that I can strip down to just melody or just white noise to meet my needs. I downloaded this app on vacation because my husband can't sleep without noise. It was exactly what he needed and I loved it as well. Happy to have found it.
Title: Choices with relaxation

Content: I love this app! I can customize my sounds and volume levels to my liking and if want to change it later, I can and it's easy! If you're looking for an app that offers sounds for relaxation/sleeping this is for you too!!
Title: Just what the Doctor ordered

Content: This app has a great selection of sounds and it's fun to mix them up for different effects. I just wish you didn't have to pay a bunch of money to be able to use the isochronic tones and binaural beats in lower frequencies (for sleep and deep relaxation). Seems like they're capitalizing on those who need help.

Content: This app gave me the power to choose my own sounds, which is an ability I rarely see in sound apps such as this. On top of that there is so much quality sounds to choose from. It is such a great app.

Title: Love it!

The sounds range from storms, white noise, lullaby sounds, my favorite is the night noises (peepers, frogs, and crickets.) I used to live in the country as a child and did a lot of camping and these sounds are nostalgic and soothing.   It has helped me to fall asleep faster and drown out the noises that would normally wake me (I‚Äôm a light sleeper... and have rambunctious kitty cats.)  Highly recommend.

Title: Great!

When I contacted them about it they said it wasn‚Äôt them, then they said to reset settings on my phone, and finally they just said they didn‚Äôt know what was happening... I handed up deleting the app.  Them spam ads only happened when I used their app.

Content: I couldn‚Äôt get to sleep, and was looking for some home remedies online when I came across this app. I have been using it for about two years now and it actually works. I fall asleep quicker and stay asleep.

Content: I love it! Helps me fall asleep and stay asleep. Love how it has a timer so you can set it to how long you‚Äôd like it to play. And even has a setting to remind you to go to bed. Perfect for someone like me.  I also really love it‚Äôs sister/brother app that‚Äôs for meditation. I use that one to go to bed sometimes as well. The perfect duo.
Title: Exceptional

Content: I downloaded this app to help me sleep while at a hotel with a noisy heater. It was a magic bullet! I was amazed. Love the many choices of sounds and the ability to customize a soundscape. I have since begun to use it regularly and it has noticeably helped me to sleep more deeply.
Title: Magic

Content: I have used this app for years. I started using it when my child was little and I needed sounds for travel. It‚Äôs come in handy time and time again. Great selection! I‚Äôve also just started using the meditation.
Title: Best sound app

Content: Use it all the time when I'm traveling. Doesn't have a pause in the sound when the recording loops back to the beginning like other apps that I've used.
Title: Helps block out noise when sleeping at a hotel

Content: I use it to block out noise while I study, to sleep when it‚Äôs too noisy, to read when the tv is too loud. My dog is terrified of thunderstorms, and I even use it with speakers to calm her down... I use this app a lot more than I even realize. It‚Äôs a great app.
Title: Very Helpful

Content: I use this app to block out noise when I‚Äôm trying to sleep on a plane or if I‚Äôm next to someone having a loud conversation on public transit. Lots of sound options which allow you to customize to your specific preferences. Love it!
Title: Great app!

Content: This is such a good app! I heard of the app ‚ÄúCalm‚Äù on tv and when I downloaded it, it said I had a 7 day free trial or pay $50. I kept looking for something similar and i found this app. I play these sounds on my tv at night. It‚Äôs relaxing and brings memories.
Title: Relaxing Melodies

Content: I love this app you can use a ton of sounds at the same time. I had another app where you could only play three at a time. The sounds really help me fall asleep faster. My personal favorites are the rain sounds. Great app, I totally recommend it.
Title: This app is AWESOME!!!

Content: Even though I have not been using this app much, I like the whole idea of choosing the sounds that suits you (whether is some noisy traffic sound or waves arriving at the shore of a beach). I have chosen a mix already that can put me right to sleep üò¥üí§
Title: Peace and tranquility

Content: Incredible variety of high quality sounds.  My fianc√© and I use this to help us sleep at night, especially when staying in hotels.  We use a Bluetooth Speaker with it.  The noises are very realistic.  I definitely recommend this app!
Title: Amazing!

Content: Got my subscription back. (Still think they should have a few more sounds free than the ones they have)  I have no idea how it unsubbed me when it updated or something. (Stupid me never looked for the ‚Äúrestore subscription ‚Äú button, but to be fair it‚Äôs a tiny button)
Title: Great support

Content: Like the app, and I really like how you can make your own sounds. I think it has been helping me sleep! You can set timers for how long you want the sound to go on for. I recommend this app instead of buying a sound machine
Title: Great app
